game.name: Attack of the Saucerman
game.desc: Save Earth's ecosystem. Ed, a peon from the Grimloid Intergalatic Empire, needs help to rid Earth of aliens. Battle alien bosses, Ned hunters and more while disbanding the illegal Ned farm. Capture the Neds and restore peace.

game.name: ATV : Quad Power Racing
game.desc: ATV: Quad Power Racing introduces to the PlayStation the slightly unusual sport of four-wheeled all-terrain vehicle racing.nnnnThe game includes three different terrain types (forest, desert and ice) with four tracks each. There are Amateur and Pro Championships for every terrain type, with Amateur and Pro tracks differing slightly. The Amateur trophy has to be won to unlock the respective Pro circuit. Players can select from six different riders and at the start there are two quads per terrain available to choose from. Winning each Amateur circuit unlocks two more per terrain and winning everything unlocks the best quad in the game.
game.genre: Rennen, Fahren, Rennen 3rd Pers., Rennen 1st Pers.

game.name: ATV Mania
game.desc: Mit aufgemotzten Quads brausen Sie in waghalsigen Wettrennen in den französischen Alpen. Neben gekonnter Fahrtechnik auf den rasanten Flitzern können Sie dabei auch auf ein beachtliches Waffenarsenal zurückgreifen, um verbissen kämpfende Gegner, die örtliche Polizei und nervige Reporter hinter sich zu lassen....

game.name: ATV Racers
game.desc: ATV Racers features a variety of animals who are out to win an ATV racing championship through means of vehicular combat racing. The game features a Tournament, Arcade, and Time Trial mode.In tournament mode, players get to choose one of the 10 (8 are selectable from the start and 2 are unlockable) animal racers to race with. The tournament offers three different sets of trophy races; the cross cup, dune cup, and the rock cup. Each cup consists of 3 different racetracks; underground, red rock, and atlantis. These 3 racetracks get altered depending on what cup the player is competing for.When racing, players attempt to beat the five opponents they are up against to the finish line. To help achieve this goal, players can shoot guided rockets, use speed boosts, and lay mines to hinder their opponents. The higher the position the player gets in a race, the more points they earn. The player with the most points after all the races are done wins the championship cup.Arcade lets the player compete on any of the available tracks so they can practice racing on them. Time Trial lets the player race solo, trying to defeat a track in as little time as possible.Options include setting the difficulty level (easy or medium), setting the number of laps (3, 5, 9 or 50), and whether to turn vibration on or off.

game.name: Austin Powers Pinball
game.desc: Groovy gamers take the role of the "International Man of Mystery" to bang bumpers and bells in this PS pinball game. The title features a selection of virtual tables, all themed after Mike Myers's original Austin Powers film. Characters such Vanessa Kensington, the Fembots, and even Mini-Me also make appearances. From the makers of Balls of Steel and Devil's Island Pinball comes this title based on the popular Austin Powers movies. Two tables are included - one based on International Man of Mystery, and the other based on The Spy Who Shagged Me. Tables can be played in either full-screen or scrolling mode. Sound effects and dot-matrix animations are taken from the movies, while the music is merely in the same style. And here comes the obligatory tagline - groovy baby, yeah!

game.name: Auto Destruct
game.desc: Der dunkle, kalte Geist eines mystischen Kults vergiftet langsam die Städte der Welt. Sie haben den Auftrag diese Verschwörung zu stoppen - mit dem Auto Features: - Wenn Sie die Larus-Jünger in 25 packenden Missionen in wilden Verfolgungsjagten und Auto-Kämpfen besiegen wollen, benötigen Sie mehr als herausragende, fahrerische Fähigkeiten: hier sind Köpfchen und Taktik gefragt - In drei Städten der Zukunft New York, San Francisco und Tokio, müssen Sie kämpfen, Personen und Objekte beschützen, begleiten oder suchen - Fahren Sie dorthin, wo Sie möchten - Sie wollen den Umweg durch den Park nehmen oder bei rot über die Kreuzung Fahren? Kein Problem, aber es ist Ihr Risiko - Ihnen steht ein Arsenal von mehr als 15 Angriffs- und Verteidigungswaffen zur Verfügung, um den Kult zu bekämpfen.

game.name: Autobahn Raser II
game.desc: Einziges Rennspiel auf Originalstrecken in Deutschland und Österreich. Sechs spanndende und realistische Stadtralleys durch Dortmund, Frankfurt, München, Wien, Hamburg, Berlin. Drei Autobahnstrecken Dortmund/Frankfurt (A45/A5), München/Wien (A8/A1), Hamburg/Berlin (A24/A10), viele bekannte Sehenswürdig- keiten, Gebäude, Plätze mit hohem Wiedererkennungswert. Man hat 13 Autos zu Auswahl vom Smart bis zum Mercedes SLR. Dreistufiges Ligasystem garantiert einen langen Spielspaß, der durch Ver- folgungsjagten mit der Polizei, das Brechen von Verkehrsregeln oder das Umfahren von Blitzgeräten noch gesteigert wird....

game.name: Ayrton Senna Kart Duel
game.desc: Ayrton Senna Kart Duel is a series of Karting-based 3D racing video games named after famous Brazilian kart and Formula One racer Ayrton Senna. In Japan, the games were developed and published by Gaps, which were released exclusively for the PlayStation under the license of Ayrton Senna Foundation, and technical advice by Yamaha and Dunlop. It was published in the european market by Sunsoft.

game.name: Ayrton Senna Kart Duel 2
game.desc: Ayrton Senna Kart Duel 2 is a 3D karting game named after famous Brazilian kart and Formula One racer Ayrton Senna. The game features a Time Attack mode, VS Battle mode and a Grand Prix mode. The Grand Prix mode contains three classes. With good results you can promote to higher classes. There are 8 tracks that can be raced on and three different difficulty settings.You race against seven opponents and you can adjust some of the settings of your kart. There are two camera viewpoints in single player, but only one in multi player.The game also features a Senna Memorial album with pictures of the famous racer.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Aztec - The Curse in the Heart of the City of Gold (Europe) (En,Nl).cue
game.name: Aztec : The Curse in the Heart of the City of Gold
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Aztec - The Curse in the Heart of the City of Gold (Europe) (En,Nl).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Aztec - The Curse in the Heart of the City of Gold (Europe) (En,Nl).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Aztec - The Curse in the Heart of the City of Gold (Europe) (En,Nl).mp4
game.desc: Aztec is an encyclopedic adventure on Playstation. You play as Small Serpent, a young Aztec witness of an assassination. Before dying, the victim warns you of a great danger that could strike the whole civilization ... It will then be necessary to escape the guards, collect objects and discover secret places. Many information on the way of living of the Aztecs gives this game a pedagogical flavor.

game.name: Azure Dreams
game.desc: Azure Dreams kombiniert traditionelle Rollenspielelemente mit Monsterzucht und Städtebau. Als Sohn des besten Monstertrainers von Monsbaiya besteht Ihre Aufgabe darin, den "Turm der Monster" zu durchsuchen und zahlreiche Aufträge zu erfüllen. Werden Sie es schaffen, die Geheimnisse des Turms zu lüften.

game.name: B-Movie
game.desc: The story for Invasion From Beyond is based on the golden age of B-Movie science fiction thrillers, and goes like this: farm workers have been abducted and crop circles were discovered in farmlands outside Washington, D.C.. The locals' insults towards superstitious fears ("Slap an Alien") were a welcome party for the Martians ready to strike. You are a fully qualified Earthlink and must pilot your ship to stop the alien invasion by manipulating the ground-based firepower of Earthlink Command and prevent the aliens from taking over our beloved planet Earth.

game.name: B-Movie
game.desc: The story for Invasion From Beyond is based on the golden age of B-Movie science fiction thrillers, and goes like this: farm workers have been abducted and crop circles were discovered in farmlands outside Washington, D.C.. The locals' insults towards superstitious fears ("Slap an Alien") were a welcome party for the Martians ready to strike. You are a fully qualified Earthlink and must pilot your ship to stop the alien invasion by manipulating the ground-based firepower of Earthlink Command and prevent the aliens from taking over our beloved planet Earth.

game.name: Baby Felix Tennis
game.desc: Baby Felix Tennis ist ein "Fun-Tennis-Spiel". In den Sommerferien verbringt Baby Felix die Freizeit mit seinen Freunden beim Tennisspielen. Verschiedene Tennisplätze und Spielmodi, sowie die Verknüpfung zwischen realistischer Simulation und catoonartigen Spielelementen sorgen für lange andauernden Spielspass.

game.name: Baby Universe
game.desc:
Welcome to Baby Universe! Take your mind to another level, submerge your senses in kaleidoscopic light shows generated by any audio CD and controlled and styled by you.
Baby Universe in an experiment in visuals. It consists of different worlds with digital kaleidoscopes. One of them, a 3D Kaleidoscope, is floating in space. You create visual effects by pressing buttons on the controller, to turn the different axes, bend and reflect light, and change the angle, with different background patterns. All your actions can be recorded and saved.
In the jewel case, you select the objects to appear on the screen, and in the console, you can edit each individual item. This includes colour mapping of the surface, movement patterns and frame rate. Settings can be saved on a memory card. In the sound scape, you can insert your own CDs, and sound wave patterns will appear to accompany the music. There is also a traditional (electric) and a psychedelic kaleidoscope available.

game.name: Baldies
game.desc: Baldies is a multiplayer action strategy game featuring cute but ruthless little bald characters that you control in order to wipe out the enemy Hairies and attain ultimate Baldie world domination. In this realtime adventure, you assume the god-like role of managing these pudgy pawns -- controlling where they go and what they do as they help you build your empire level after level. In order to survive and grow, you must quickly make resource management decisions on which Baldies should become Workers, Scientists, Soldiers or Builders.

game.name: BallBlazer Champions
game.desc: Four alien species -- the Zaltecs, Thilibies, Mandalars, and Kraytons -- had been at war for a long time. In order to end the bloodshed the aliens signed a treaty that created a new sport, BallBlazer. Once a year, from that day on, each species sends its best rotofoilers to a two-week competition to determine which species is the best. Also, other species have since joined the Interstellar BallBlazer Conference. BallBlazer is similar to one-on-one indoor soccer with weapons. Your main objective is to put the ball into the goal more than your opponent can. Characters ride vehicles called rotofoils that they use to speed around the arenas. In order to win a match you must win two out of three of the 4-minute rounds. To become the champion eight opponents must be defeated. Eight characters are available to choose from and game modes include: practice, tournament, 1-player free play, and 2-player free play. BallBlazer Champions requires one memory block for each saved game.

game.name: BallBlazer Champions
game.desc: Four alien species -- the Zaltecs, Thilibies, Mandalars, and Kraytons -- had been at war for a long time. In order to end the bloodshed the aliens signed a treaty that created a new sport, BallBlazer. Once a year, from that day on, each species sends its best rotofoilers to a two-week competition to determine which species is the best. Also, other species have since joined the Interstellar BallBlazer Conference. BallBlazer is similar to one-on-one indoor soccer with weapons. Your main objective is to put the ball into the goal more than your opponent can. Characters ride vehicles called rotofoils that they use to speed around the arenas. In order to win a match you must win two out of three of the 4-minute rounds. To become the champion eight opponents must be defeated. Eight characters are available to choose from and game modes include: practice, tournament, 1-player free play, and 2-player free play. BallBlazer Champions requires one memory block for each saved game.

game.name: Ballerburg
game.desc: Vier Schwestern königlicher Herkunft streiten sich in mittelalterlichem Szenario um die Herrschaft im Lande. Der Spieler schlüpft in Ballerburg in die Rolle einer Prinzessin, übernimmt ihre Burgen, heuert Krieger an und entfacht einen erbitterten Krieg. Erst wenn alle feindlichen Gemäuer fallen, findet das Feuergefecht sein Ende. Mit umfangreichem Waffenarsenal aus Katapulten, Kanonen und Fantasiegeschossen wie Zeppelinbombern starten streitlustige Königstöchter ihr gnadenloses Dauerfeuer auf gegnerisches Bollwerk. Um deine Rüstungsoffensive zu finanzieren, schuften einfache Bauern auf den Feldern und zahlen fleißig Steuern. Jetzt liegt es am strategischen Kalkül des Burgbesitzers, ob er das Geld sofort in Munition umwandelt oder der Erforschung neuer, effektiverer Waffen zuteilt.

game.name: Ballerburg
game.desc: Vier Schwestern königlicher Herkunft streiten sich in mittelalterlichem Szenario um die Herrschaft im Lande. Der Spieler schlüpft in Ballerburg in die Rolle einer Prinzessin, übernimmt ihre Burgen, heuert Krieger an und entfacht einen erbitterten Krieg. Erst wenn alle feindlichen Gemäuer fallen, findet das Feuergefecht sein Ende. Mit umfangreichem Waffenarsenal aus Katapulten, Kanonen und Fantasiegeschossen wie Zeppelinbombern starten streitlustige Königstöchter ihr gnadenloses Dauerfeuer auf gegnerisches Bollwerk. Um deine Rüstungsoffensive zu finanzieren, schuften einfache Bauern auf den Feldern und zahlen fleißig Steuern. Jetzt liegt es am strategischen Kalkül des Burgbesitzers, ob er das Geld sofort in Munition umwandelt oder der Erforschung neuer, effektiverer Waffen zuteilt.

game.name: Ballistic
game.desc: Achtung! Eine neue Art von Geschicklichkeitsspiel wird Sie in den Bann ziehen und nicht mehr loslassen! Ballistic heißt die neue Sucht, die Einzug auf die PlayStation und den Game Boy Color hält. Das Grundprinzip von Ballistic ist einfach und somit schnell zu erlernen. Ihre Aufgabe ist es, mit einem drehbaren Turm, der farbige Kugeln verschießt, die Mitte des Spielfeldes zu beschützen. Angegriffen werden Sie von ebenso farbigen Ku- geln, die sich spiralförmig Ihrem Turm nähern. Schießen Sie Ihre farbigen Kugeln in die sich drehende Spirale, um lange, gleich- farbige Ketten innerhalb der gegnerischen Kugeln zu bilden. Die- se Ketten detonieren, sobald sich drei gleiche Kugeln nebenei- nander befinden. Klingt einfach, oder? Im Prinzip ist es das auch, aber es reicht nicht, immer nur drei gleiche Kugeln deto- nieren zu lassen. Sie müssen clever voarausdenken, um Kettenre- aktionen auslösen zu können, die dann die sich nähernde Gefahr der gegnerischen Kugeln atomisieren. Ballistic ist nicht zuletzt durch seine spannende Spielmodi ein außergewöhnlich gutes Ge- schicklichkeitsspiel. So können sie ihre Schnelligkeit und Cleverness im Panikmodus, im Levelmodus und im 2-Spielermodus auf die Probe stellen. FEATURES: - 3 verschiedene Spielmodi: Panikmodus, Levelmodus und 2-Spie- lermodus - 2-Spielermodus per Splitscreen - Dual-Shock-Support - Leicht zu erlernendes Spielprinzip

game.name: Baphomets Fluch
game.desc:
Der Amerikaner George Stobbart (gesprochen von Alexander Schottky) verbringt die Herbstzeit im Urlaub in Paris und genießt das Flair eines Straßencafés, als ein Clown das Café betritt. Kurze Zeit später kommt der Clown wieder herausgelaufen und es kommt zu einer Bombenexplosion, die das Café verwüstet und einen Gast tötet. Als George auf eigene Faust zu ermitteln beginnt, lernt er die französische Journalistin Nicole Collard (Franziska Pigulla) kennen und findet mit ihr heraus, dass hinter dem Mord ein gewisser Khan steckt, der dem alten Geheimbund der Hashshashin angehört. Diese wollen verhindern, dass der ebenfalls im Geheimen operierende Templerorden die Beschwörung des Dämons Baphomet erfolgreich vollziehen kann.
Das Abenteuer findet zum größten Teil in Paris statt, zwischendurch reist George jedoch auch nach Irland, Spanien, Syrien und Schottland. Während des Erlebnisses kommen sich George und Nicole persönlich näher.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Baphomets Fluch II - Die Spiegel der Finsternis (Germany).cue
game.name: Baphomets Fluch II : Die Spiegel der Finsternis
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Baphomets Fluch II - Die Spiegel der Finsternis (Germany).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Baphomets Fluch II - Die Spiegel der Finsternis (Germany).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Baphomets Fluch II - Die Spiegel der Finsternis (Germany).mp4
game.desc: Follow the breathtaking tale of George Stobbard as he circles the globe trying to rescue Nico, his investigative reporter girlfriend. Their adventure leads not only to the heart of a ruthless Central American crime syndicate but back to the arcane power of the ancient civilization of the Mayan civilization.

game.name: Barbie : Explorer
game.desc: She has the house, the boat, the college degree, the athletic accomplishments, and the perfect boyfriend. What else could Barbie possibly want? Adventure! Join Mattel's franchise star for a 3D escapade designed especially for younger gamers. Help Barbie jump, roll, kick, and climb her way though dense jungles and ancient ruins in this delightful chapter of her impressive life. There are four missing jewels to be tracked down, and Barbie's just the brave soul to find them. You'll have to solve a ton of tricky puzzles, collect valuable clues from your environment, and avoid deadly traps throughout each level of this detailed epic. Boasting a great story, state-of-the-art graphics, and hours of non-violent gameplay, BARBIE EXPLORER is the perfect way to spend a little time after school or on a weekend. Play alone or go head-to-head with a fellow toy fan to see who's the best Barbie.

game.name: Barbie : Explorer
game.desc: She has the house, the boat, the college degree, the athletic accomplishments, and the perfect boyfriend. What else could Barbie possibly want? Adventure! Join Mattel's franchise star for a 3D escapade designed especially for younger gamers. Help Barbie jump, roll, kick, and climb her way though dense jungles and ancient ruins in this delightful chapter of her impressive life. There are four missing jewels to be tracked down, and Barbie's just the brave soul to find them. You'll have to solve a ton of tricky puzzles, collect valuable clues from your environment, and avoid deadly traps throughout each level of this detailed epic. Boasting a great story, state-of-the-art graphics, and hours of non-violent gameplay, BARBIE EXPLORER is the perfect way to spend a little time after school or on a weekend. Play alone or go head-to-head with a fellow toy fan to see who's the best Barbie.

game.name: Barbie : Race & Ride
game.desc: Barbie makes her first appearance on the PlayStation with BARBIE RACE AND RIDE. Help Barbie take care of a stable of horses; groom the horses or feed them a variety of foods including apples, carrots, strawberries, and sugar cubes. After the steed is taken care of, go on a casual ride around Secret Valley. Explore the beaches, meadows, mountains, and forests to discover new animal friends, mini-games, and puzzles. Find the pieces of the missing postcard and discover the secret of Secret Valley. For those with a more competitive streak, enter a race or jumping contest.

game.name: Barbie : Race & Ride
game.desc: Barbie makes her first appearance on the PlayStation with BARBIE RACE AND RIDE. Help Barbie take care of a stable of horses; groom the horses or feed them a variety of foods including apples, carrots, strawberries, and sugar cubes. After the steed is taken care of, go on a casual ride around Secret Valley. Explore the beaches, meadows, mountains, and forests to discover new animal friends, mini-games, and puzzles. Find the pieces of the missing postcard and discover the secret of Secret Valley. For those with a more competitive streak, enter a race or jumping contest.

game.name: Barbie : Super Sport
game.desc: Snowboard and In-line skate with Barbie and friends for extreme racing and sports action in Barbie Super Sports. It's two games in one for twice the fun! Both events have a practice area where Barbie gives advice on how to race and get better scores, which will earn tickets that can be traded in for better equipment. And you'll need better equipment if you want to beat Barbie and her friends. After beating the computer-controlled opponents, challenge your friends to a race with the Two-Player mode, or see who can complete a course the fastest in the Time-Trial mode. Whether it is snowboarding or in-line skating, with Barbie anything is possible.

game.name: Barbie : Super Sports
game.desc: Snowboard and In-line skate with Barbie and friends for extreme racing and sports action in Barbie Super Sports. It's two games in one for twice the fun! Both events have a practice area where Barbie gives advice on how to race and get better scores, which will earn tickets that can be traded in for better equipment. And you'll need better equipment if you want to beat Barbie and her friends. After beating the computer-controlled opponents, challenge your friends to a race with the Two-Player mode, or see who can complete a course the fastest in the Time-Trial mode. Whether it is snowboarding or in-line skating, with Barbie anything is possible.

game.name: Batman & Robin
game.desc: Übernimm die Kontrolle über Batman, Robin oder Batgirl, während du versuchst, Gotham City vor dem bösen Mr. Freeze und Poison Ivy zu retten. Mit einer einzigartigen Mischung aus Action, Abenteuer und Fahren in einer kompletten 3-D-Gotham City.

game.name: Batman : Gotham City Racer
game.desc: Steuere futuristische Fahrzeuge durch das Batman-Universum. Gotham City braucht Dich! Tauche in die Welt des dunklen Ritters ein, kämpfe gegen üble Verbrecher und beschütze die Bevölkerung. FEATURES: - 51 aufregende, episodenbasierte Missionen mit Originalsequenzen aus der Fernsehserie - 2 spannende Spielvarianten: Adventure-Modus und Patrol-Modus. - 15 Charaktere und 16 Fahrzeuge inklusive dem legendärem Batmobil und dem coolen Batcycle. - Erforsche das kolosale Batman-Universum in einer faszinierenden 3D-Umgebung mit 2 verschiedenen Kameraperspektiven. - Übernimm die Rolle des Superhelden Batman, eines seiner Verbündeten oder spiele einen üblen Schurken.

game.name: Batman Forever : The Arcade Game
game.desc:
Batman Forever: Das Arcade-Spiel basiert auf dem gleichnamigen Film. Ein oder zwei Spieler, die als Batman und Robin spielen, kämpfen gegen Two-Face, den Riddler und zahlreiche Handlanger.
Die Spieler, die entweder Batman oder Robin spielen, schlagen, treten und verwenden spezielle Kombinationsangriffe, um Wellen von Feinden zu besiegen. Die speziellen Kombinationen, die auf Gegner angewendet werden, können zu mehr als 150 Treffern bei einem einzelnen Bösewicht führen. Spezielle Waffen wie Batarangs sind in allen Leveln zu finden. Es wird in Stufen unterteilt und mit Wellen von Feinden arrangiert, bevor es mit einem Boss endet.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Batman of the Future - Return of the Joker (Europe) (En,Fr,De).cue
game.name: Batman of the Future : Return of the Joker
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Batman of the Future - Return of the Joker (Europe) (En,Fr,De).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Batman of the Future - Return of the Joker (Europe) (En,Fr,De).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Batman of the Future - Return of the Joker (Europe) (En,Fr,De).mp4
game.desc:
Basierend auf dem gleichnamigen Animationsfilm ist Beyond ein 3D-Brawler, der den Spieler auf die Straßen von Gotham (Beyond) versetzt, um den immer grinsenden Joker zu erledigen. Einige davon sind gentechnisch verändert.
Es gibt mehrere "Batanzüge", aus denen Sie auswählen können, von denen jeder seine eigenen besonderen Fähigkeiten und Ziele hat.

game.name: Battle Arena Toshinden
game.desc: DIES IST IHRE EINLADUNG...zum Kampf des Jahrhunderts! Die größten Martial-Arts-Experten haben sich versammelt, um einen Wettkampf auf Leben und Tod auszutragen. Die Kämpfer in diesem Turnier riskieren alles für die Chance, den Titel des stärksten und besten Kämpfers der Welt zu erringen. Es ist Ihre Bestimmung als Kämpfer, den Ruhm des Siegers zu ernten oder die Schmach des Verlieres zu ertragen!...

game.name: Battle Arena Toshinden 2
game.desc: Fortsetzung von Battle Arena Toshinden 1. Noch schneller, zusätzliche Kampftechniken, neue Spielfiguren und vollständig überarbeiteten Gameplay. ...

game.name: Battle Arena Toshinden 3
game.desc: The third installment in the classic series of 3D fighting games for the Playstation, Battle Arena Toshinden 3 adds new characters, new special moves, and new play modes to the formula. One or two players can go head to head in a series of one-on-one fights, using regular, special, and super moves to knock the competitor's energy bar down to zero. Characters possess a wide variety of weaponry, and players will be dueling with swords, scythes, spears, pistols, and stranger arms in addition to engaging in hand-to-hand combat.

game.name: Battle Stations
game.desc: Battlestations doesn't mess around with fancy storylines or deep, involving mission objectives; instead, it focuses all its energy in two players blowing the smithereens out of each other on open water! Either two human players or a computer-controlled opponent can play a barrage of different war games set throughout different game play options. With a total of seventy-six action-packed missions (both single-player and multiplayer combined), game play options include the Arcade, Campaign, and War Games modes. The Arcade mode offers a no-frills ship-to-ship war simulation between you and an opponent. With the overall objective to become Fleet Admiral, players will earn points for sinking their opponent's ships and progress through ten different naval rankings. Campaign pits man versus computer in a variety of single-player missions. Mission objectives include search and destroy operations, seeking out lost crew members, mobilizing and deploying various fleets and ships, and spine tingling one-on-one battleship rumbles. There are five different enemy commanders each with his or her own unique skills and weaknesses; Rear Admiral Evelyn Kennedy is terrifically skilled in all areas while Ballast is a patient and methodical opponent, eventually exploiting your own strategies.

game.name: BattleSport
game.desc:
Battlesport simulates the sport of the future. Choose your vehicle and enter the arena to face your computer opponents to see who scores the most goals before the clock runs out.
Scoring isn't easy. The ball constantly bounces over the arena, retrieved by a player constantly bombarded by opponents. A variety of weapons are available to shoot your competitor, and anyone that takes a hit while carrying the ball loses possession, sending the ball bouncing across the arena. Taking too many shots results in a temporary inability to take part in the action while your opponent happily scores goals.
Winning matches increases standing in the rankings and the acquisition of cash to purchase a better vehicle and enhanced offensive or defensive items.

game.name: BattleTanx : Global Assault
game.desc: Sie suchen die ultimative Herausforderung? Dann legen Sie dieses Spiel ein und genießen Sie packende 3D-Action inmitten eines grandiosen Machtkampfs, der Ihren Bildschirm zum Beben bringt. Haben Sie das Zeug zum Machine Hunter? Machine Hunter entführt Sie in eine ganz neue Dimension des 3D-Kampfes. Hier lauern an jeder Ecke intelligente Roboter-Gegner auf ihre Chance, warten sensationelle unterirdische Welten auf ihren Entdecker und es liegt genug Feuerkraft herum, um jeden Angriff in aller Härte zu erwidern. übernehmen Sie einen Koloß nach dem anderen und richten Sie seine Kraft gegen den von kaltblütigen Invasoren umprogrammierten restlichen Maschinenapparat.

game.name: BDFL Manager 2001
game.desc: LMA (League Managers Association) Manager 2001 is the sequel to last year's acclaimed Playstation soccer management title, LMA Manager. Developed by Codemasters, the same British developers behind Colin McRae 2.0 and Jarrett & Labonte Stock Car Racing, LMA 2K1 is a simple take on soccer management that is perfect for casual soccer fans. However, the limitations of the aging PSOne hardware mean that the game doesn't have nearly as much depth as the reigning champ of soccer management games, Championship Manager, and hardcore soccer fans might want to look elsewhere.

game.name: BDFL Manager 2001
game.desc: LMA (League Managers Association) Manager 2001 is the sequel to last year's acclaimed Playstation soccer management title, LMA Manager. Developed by Codemasters, the same British developers behind Colin McRae 2.0 and Jarrett & Labonte Stock Car Racing, LMA 2K1 is a simple take on soccer management that is perfect for casual soccer fans. However, the limitations of the aging PSOne hardware mean that the game doesn't have nearly as much depth as the reigning champ of soccer management games, Championship Manager, and hardcore soccer fans might want to look elsewhere.

game.name: BDFL Manager 2002
game.desc:
LMA 2002 was the final version in the series to be released on PlayStation, launched in October 2001. Although chiefly just an update from the 2001 version, the game did prove to be quite a stepping stone from the LMA of old and the LMA seen today.
The first PlayStation 2 incarnation went under the same name when released in April 2002. A significant update from PS1, it allowed players to manage in one of six European leagues, all of which were processed by the game simultaneously (the top two divisions in Italy, Spain, Germany and France were added, in addition to the existing top four divisions in England and Scotland). On the PS2, matches played out in full in a 3D match environment, followed by post-match highlights voiced by famous BBC presenter Gary Lineker alongside the returning Hansen. The game play advanced in this game from the 2001 version, in particular the in-match style. Players tend to shoot early, from around thirty yards, rather than enter into the penalty area.

game.name: Beach Volleyball
game.desc: Infogrames brings two-on-two beach volleyball to the PlayStation in Power Spike Pro Beach Volleyball. The game is licensed by the FIVB and features 40 real volleyball heroes like Gabrielle Reece and Sinjin Smith. Real-life venues are also featured, with play in 14 different locations around the world including Sidney, Osaka, and Los Angeles. There is also an option for players to design their own beach volleyball superstars. Gameplay integrates an icon-based system for precise placement of bumps, digs, and spikes. With a multi-tap and enough controllers, up to four players can compete at once in Power Strike Pro Beach Volleyball, each controlling a different volleyball star on the competing two-person teams.

game.name: Beast Wars : Transformers
game.desc: Bekannt aus der gleichnamigen Fernsehserie. In 24 Power-Leveln übernehmen Sie die Rolle einer der zehn Beast Wars Transformers. Sie können wahlweise in die Rolle der bösartigen Predators oder der guten Maximals schlüpfen. Es geht um die Macht über das Universum. Neuartige 3D-Technologien ermöglichen Transformationen in Echtzeit.

game.name: Beatmania
game.desc:
Auf dem Weg zum Top-DJ. Die Grundidee könnte einfacher nicht sein: Drücken Sie bestimmte Tastenfolgen im Rhythmus unterschiedlicher Musikrichtungen : Hip-Hop, Garage, Techno, Reggae und House. Klingt Ihr Mix gut, gibt's reichlich Kohle. Klingt er schlecht, so werden Sie von der Masse ausgebuht.
FEATURES: - Vergessen Sie die aktuellen Musikspiele auf PlayStation! Beatmania ist innovativ und Unterhaltung pur! - Die neuesten Songs der bekanntesten DJs der europäischen Club- Szene (Claudio Coccoluto, Moloko...) - Inklusive Spezial-Controller mit Mini-Keyboard und Plattenteller für den totalen Scratch-Spaß! - Kampf der DJs: Süchtig machender 2-Spieler-Modus für gleich- zeitiges Spielen (egal ob zwei oder nur ein Spezial-Controller verfügbar sind, denn Beatmania kann auch mit dem normalen Joy- pad gespielt werden) - Total ausgeflippte Optik mit speziell für Europa entwickelten Musikvideos.

game.name: Bedlam
game.desc: Bedlam is a shooter in which players control one of three robots from a top down perspective and must blow up almost everything that crosses their path. According to the story, biomechanical creatures that were originally harmless and created to perform menial chores have mutated into fearsome beings and taken over the planet. Players take on the role of a mercenary who must control a team of up to three robots in order to put a stop to the biomech's tyranny. The battle takes place on three different fronts and involves the destruction of just about every object on the screen, including waves of attacking enemies. All sorts of weapons and power-ups can be added to your arsenal while traversing through the levels, and they'll be put to good use when the fray starts. A few puzzles are thrown in for good measure, but this title's focus is purely on the action.

game.name: Beyblade
game.desc:
Fokus des Spiels sind die Turniere in der Beyblade Arena. Die Gegner kämpfen mit ihren Blades gegen einander, um unschlagbar zu werden und den ultimativen Champion zu ermitteln. Je mehr Kämpfe gewonnen werden, umso mehr Möglichkeiten zum Upgrade der Blades gibt es. Die Spieler starten ihren Kreisel und müssen durch geschickte Taktik Schaden ausgleichen und den Gegner besiegen.
FEATURES: * 3 verschiedene Spielmodi: Tournament (Einzelspieler-Turnier-Modus), Free Battle (In diesem Mehrspielermodus können Sie heiße Matches gegen den Computer oder einen Freund spielen), Customise (Kaufen Sie verschiedene Teile und tunen Sie ihren Beyblade bis zum Maximum * Die intuitive Steuerung garantiert sofortigen Spielspaß * 10 verschiedene spielbare Charaktere * Alle Wettkämpfe in den Arenen sind kommentiert * Die Blades sind mit 6 verschiedenen Teilen aufrüstbar * Besiegen Sie ihren Gegner in dem sie aus dem Stadion schießen oder weichen Sie ihm so lange aus, bis er keinen Schwung mehr hat * Das Spiel beinhaltet tolle Soundeffekte, die an die TV-Serie angelehnt sind.

game.name: Big Air
game.desc: Accolade and Pitbull Syndicate have teamed up for Big Air, another take on the snowboarding genre that has you participating on thirty courses throughout six different countries including France, Japan, Scotland, Switzerland, the United States, and Germany. There are quite a few game play options in addition to the typical snowboarding fare including the World Tour, Training, One-Player and Two-Player modes. Training mode is there for new players to get used to the various game play options and controls whereas the One-Player mode allows you to compete against another contestant in a series of competitions. Among the different game types include the Freeride Race, Freeride Trick, Half Pipe, Big Air, and Boardercross. The Freeride Race has you racing against an opponent for the best possible time; no points are awarded for performing tricks. Points are awarded, however, for tricks in the Freeride Trick mode. You're also graded on the race time remaining at the end of the competition.

game.name: Big Bass Fishing
game.desc: Big Bass Fishing offers three gameplay modes, Arcade, Competition, and Challenge, as well as five specific events for anglers looking to wet their hooks while staying dry. Avoid bugs, insects, and bad weather as you try to outwit the big one in Free Fishing mode, Beat-the-Clock challenges, 2-Day Lunker, and 3-Day All Release contests, or the ultimate 3-Day Tournament. Unlock new locations via 15-minute timed events featuring goals such as catching two fish of any type, or reeling in two or three largemouth, smallmouth, or spotted bass of at least seven pounds in separate challenges. Arcade mode requires you to catch five fish in five minutes, with an additional 90 seconds added for each one caught, and each time five fish are netted, you automatically move to a new location. Fourteen species of freshwater fish can be hooked, including multiple types of bass, bluegill, and more, in a dozen locations based in two lakes, a river, and a reservoir. The only fisherman in the game is a woman and you have no interactive control over boat movement. Gameplay consists of choosing the best of a wide selection of lures for each situation, casting, and reeling in the fish while using optional gauges that indicate line tension, fish interest, and the effectiveness of the lure. Two camera angles offer perspectives from behind the angler in the boat or underwater from a fish-eye view, and you can track the top catches of each type of fish in each event via the game's record section.

game.name: Big Strike Bowling
game.desc: Sind Sie der König der Abräumer oder der Pudelkönig? Ziehen Sie Ihre Straßenschuhe aus, polieren Sie Ihre Bowlingkugel auf Hochglanz und treten Sie ein in die Arena von Big Strike Bowling. Wählen Sie einen der einzigartigen Bowler aus und lassen Sie es auf den abgefahrensten Bahnen der Welt so richtig krachen...

game.name: Bio F.R.E.A.K.S.
game.desc: Control one of eight cybernetically enhanced Bio-Freaks warriors in this unique 3D fighter from the creators of the popular Mortal Kombat. Set in an apocalyptic future, the freaks have the ability to fight with combos and fire machine guns and missile launchers. The block action can also elicit a full body shield that protects you from bullets and other projectiles. A nice twist in Bio F.R.E.A.K.S is that you can fight on land and in the air with the typical Mortal Kombat/SteetFighter button combinations (two punch, two kick) while implementing two side step buttons and a fire button (for your weapon). The huge, lethal (a flame pit, lava, and giant rollers) environments allow for full 3D movement either in the air or on the ground. Bio F.R.E.A.K.S also offers an option to 'turn-off' the gore and blood, and options to turn off the shield, flight, and fire capabilities for a more traditional fighting game. Beyond the arcade mode, Bio F.R.E.A.K.S also offers a survival, team, versus, and practice mode for more replay value!

game.name: Bishi Bashi Special
game.desc: Hinter dem seltsamen Namen Bishi Bashi Special verbirgt sich die Konsolenumsetzung der Arcade-Automa­ten Super Bishi Bashi und Hyper Bishi Bashi. Im Hauptmenü dürft Ihr zwischen den Party-Spielesammlungen wäh­len und anschließend ein kom­­plettes Turnier absolvieren, einzelne Varianten probezocken oder Euch im Mehr­spieler-Modus mit bis zu acht Personen ver­gnügen. Unter den knapp 100 Mini-Spielen ist für jeden Party-Löwen etwas dabei.

game.name: Black Dawn
game.desc: The year is 1998 and terrorist activity is rampant. All efforts for peace have failed. With no peaceful end in sight, the U.S. Government has funded a top secret Black Operations military group to attack and destroy the terrorists and rescue any hostages. Black Dawn puts you in control of a combat helicopter, the Agile Warrior: F-IIIX, with two flight modes, six views, and thirty-two missions to blast through. Everything else is on a need-to-know basis. A saved game requires one memory block. Black Dawn fulfills a few childhood dreams by putting gamers in control of a military helicopter. Terrorists have grown powerful in the world and it is up to you to restore stability and peace throughout the lands. Assigned to a variety of campaigns, you must fly the AH-69 Mohawk (sounds like something Jan-Michael Vincent from AIRWOLF would pilot) as you battle through enemy territory across different global locales.

game.name: Blade
game.desc: With assistance from his friend and mentor Abraham Whistler, Blade has vowed to rid the world of all vampires. As Blade and in later missions Abraham Whistler, you must traverse foreboding towers, buildings and streets in an effort to cleanse the world of evil. Played from a third-person perspective, Blade involves fighting a variety of enemies including vampires, henchmen, militia soldiers, police, attack hounds, zombies and SWAT soldiers. Vanquishing your enemies involves using one of the following five weapons: a double-edged Japanese sword, handgun, shotgun, the Multi-Launcher and Machine Pistol. In order to use these items, however, ammunition must be obtained. There are four kinds including standard, carbon, explosive and silver. To help determine which ammo is appropriate for a particular enemy, you can check their color-based genetic makeup. Yellow represents a monster, green is human, while red represents a vampire.

game.name: Blade
game.desc: With assistance from his friend and mentor Abraham Whistler, Blade has vowed to rid the world of all vampires. As Blade and in later missions Abraham Whistler, you must traverse foreboding towers, buildings and streets in an effort to cleanse the world of evil. Played from a third-person perspective, Blade involves fighting a variety of enemies including vampires, henchmen, militia soldiers, police, attack hounds, zombies and SWAT soldiers. Vanquishing your enemies involves using one of the following five weapons: a double-edged Japanese sword, handgun, shotgun, the Multi-Launcher and Machine Pistol. In order to use these items, however, ammunition must be obtained. There are four kinds including standard, carbon, explosive and silver. To help determine which ammo is appropriate for a particular enemy, you can check their color-based genetic makeup. Yellow represents a monster, green is human, while red represents a vampire.

game.name: Blam! Machinehead
game.desc:
Blam! Machinehead is basically a normal 3D shooter where you shoot enemies and explore the futuristic, barren wastelands and abandoned factories and such as you try to save the world. The player controls Kimberly Stride, who is a scientist. She has to save the world from bad DNA that is slowly "eating" everything away.
As a player, you control this hovercraft-thingy which was designed to be a safe vehicle to be in while travelling through this infested world. The game has nice 3D graphics and a very unique mood to it that separates it from the more common shooters.

game.name: Blam! Machinehead
game.desc:
Blam! Machinehead is basically a normal 3D shooter where you shoot enemies and explore the futuristic, barren wastelands and abandoned factories and such as you try to save the world. The player controls Kimberly Stride, who is a scientist. She has to save the world from bad DNA that is slowly "eating" everything away.
As a player, you control this hovercraft-thingy which was designed to be a safe vehicle to be in while travelling through this infested world. The game has nice 3D graphics and a very unique mood to it that separates it from the more common shooters.

game.name: Blast Chamber
game.desc: The year is 2096 and you've been genetically transformed into a superhuman combatant; the only home you know is the stable, an intense training complex. You're being prepared for The Game, an unknown competition between rival stables. You've been excluded from society for one simple reason: the spectator sport known as Blast Chamber. Owned by the stable's manager, you're fresh meat in a highly dangerous sport involving fast-paced action and life ending explosions. Should you claim victory, you may have a shot at freedom... Blast Chamber features sixty levels set throughout rotational 3D chambers. As the chamber moves, the floor becomes a wall and the walls turn into ceilings and floors. The objective of each level is to obtain the crystal within the allotted time and before your competition to progress to the next chamber and avoid a rather gruesome death.

game.name: Blast Radius
game.desc: In Blast Radius, you are the last member of an elite fighter squadron, and you have landed in the middle of the conflict between the evil Kotan-Kai and the docile Vorn. The Vorn want you to defend them; in return, you?ll get to fly nine of their most advanced spacecraft. Take out the Kotan-Kai with 13 different weapons including torpedoes, rockets, seeker missiles, and fusion nukes in 40 levels of intense dogfighting action. After successfully defending the Vorn, use a link-cable to destroy your friends in the Two-Player mode.

game.name: Blaster Master : Blasting Again
game.desc:
Years ago, the Earth was threatened by an evil being known as the Plutonium Boss. The Plutonium Boss and his minions were devouring the Earth from within, and if they had succeeded, Earth would've been destroyed.
He didn't count on a young man named Jason, a beautiful alien woman named Eve, and their battle tank, the Sofia MA-01...because of his underestimation, the Plutonium Boss was defeated.
Since then, Jason had been defending the Earth from any threat that arises, with Eve by his side. She even bore him two children, Roddy and Elfie. Jason trained Elfie in engineering, and Roddy in battling in Sofia. But now Jason and Eve have died, and Roddy must take his father's place as defender of the Earth.
And an old threat seems to be arising to challenge this new generation of heroes...
game.genre: Shooter, Shooter / Fahrzeug, 3rd. Pers., Rennen, Fahren

game.name: Blasto
game.desc: Bosco, der Schrecklichste ist der Anführer einer Invasion aus dem All, und nur ein Mann kann sie stoppen: Captain Blasto. Nur er hat in diesem einzigartigen Cartoon-Adventure die notwendigen Waffen, die rettenden Ideen und den unbesiegbaren Willen, das Universum mit viel Witz und viel Geballer von allen ekelhaften grünen Männchen zu befreien.

game.name: Blaze & Blade : Eternal Quest
game.desc: Nur eine Gruppe entschlossener Helden kann das verwunschene Reich Foresia von den dämonischen Besatzern befreien. Statt wie bei "Final Fantasy VII" vorgefertigte Charaktere zu steuern, erschafft der Spieler am Anfang seine eigenen Helden, wobei die Macht magiebegabter Zauberer oder die Flugfähigkeit einer Fee sowohl im Kampf als auch zum Lösen einiger Rätsel unerläßlich sind. Dann startet das Abenteuer mit zahlreichen Echtzeitkämfen gegen Monsterhorden, Spinnen und zaubernde Gnome. Dabei können die Helden neben herkömmlichen Waffen auch Spezialfertigkeiten einsetzen.

game.name: Blaze & Blade : Eternal Quest
game.desc: Nur eine Gruppe entschlossener Helden kann das verwunschene Reich Foresia von den dämonischen Besatzern befreien. Statt wie bei "Final Fantasy VII" vorgefertigte Charaktere zu steuern, erschafft der Spieler am Anfang seine eigenen Helden, wobei die Macht magiebegabter Zauberer oder die Flugfähigkeit einer Fee sowohl im Kampf als auch zum Lösen einiger Rätsel unerläßlich sind. Dann startet das Abenteuer mit zahlreichen Echtzeitkämfen gegen Monsterhorden, Spinnen und zaubernde Gnome. Dabei können die Helden neben herkömmlichen Waffen auch Spezialfertigkeiten einsetzen.

game.name: Blazing Dragons
game.desc: Du bist ein Drachenritter. Aber Du brauchst kein Schwert - nur einen Psychiater. Ein verrücktes Sammelsurium von 43 Figuren, erdacht von Monty Pythons Terry Jones, stürzt sich in diese irre Arcade-Action. Das tierische Katzapult und das Daumenwettdrücken beim Drachenturnier muß man einfach gesehen haben! Rette das Land Gammelpot vor dem schwarzen Drachen, löse Rätsel und erkunde die Legenden des Mittelalters. Mit Humor à la Monty Python....

game.name: Blazing Dragons
game.desc: Du bist ein Drachenritter. Aber Du brauchst kein Schwert - nur einen Psychiater. Ein verrücktes Sammelsurium von 43 Figuren, erdacht von Monty Pythons Terry Jones, stürzt sich in diese irre Arcade-Action. Das tierische Katzapult und das Daumenwettdrücken beim Drachenturnier muß man einfach gesehen haben! Rette das Land Gammelpot vor dem schwarzen Drachen, löse Rätsel und erkunde die Legenden des Mittelalters. Mit Humor à la Monty Python....

game.name: Block Buster
game.desc: Zerstöre die Bausteine ??in diesem Arkanoid-Klon, der eine Horde neuer Systeme enthält, darunter den mächtigen "Squash Ball" und "Wall Shake". 2 Spieler können gegeneinander antreten. Stiehl den Ball deines Gegners und mache daraus deinen Namen! Neue Level bringen Leben in diesen berühmten alten Arcade-Klassiker

game.name: Blockids
game.desc: Blockids for PlayStation is a 3D take on the arcade classic Breakout. Players choose one of eight animated characters and prepare to compete against an assortment of colorful opponents whose fortresses must be breached. The object is to break a series of bricks by smashing a ricocheting ball into them using a horizontal paddle. The default view is presented from an angled top-down perspective, but players can switch to a perspective right behind the paddle for a more 3D feel. New twists on the classic gameplay include the ability to bounce the ball over barriers as well as earn a special power-up by scoring a certain number of points. Level progress and high scores during the game can be saved to memory card, with mouse support also available for precision sliding movement.

game.name: Blood Lines
game.desc: Der Wettkampfsport, der in der Zukunft spielt, ist verboten. In einem unterirdischen Netzwerk der weltbesten Athleten werden noch immer illegale Wettkämpfe abgehalten. Inspiriert von den Völkern der alten Zeit bilden sie Clans und treten in Stammeskämpfen gegeneinander an, um die Ehre ihrer Blutlinien zu schützen. Es kann nur einen Gewinner geben. Beherrsche einen der Clans und kämpfe bis zum Tod gegen mehrere Gegner. Die Umgebungen ermöglichen das Roaming und Verstecken, sodass Spieler taktisch angreifen und weglaufen können, um Angriffen auszuweichen. Waffen können überall in der Arena gefunden, benutzt und aufgeladen werden.

game.name: Blood Omen : Legacy of Kain
game.desc: Einmal Vampir sein und nie sterben. Auferstanden von den Toten, schlüpfen Sie in die Rolle des Antihelden Kain, der sich auf den Weg gemacht hat, grausame Rache zu nehmen und den unstillbaren Durst nach Blut zu befriedigen. Hardcore-Splatter mit Blutorgien, zerfetzten Leibern, abgehackten Extremitäten und Jungfrauen.

game.name: Blood Omen : Legacy of Kain
game.desc: Einmal Vampir sein und nie sterben. Auferstanden von den Toten, schlüpfen Sie in die Rolle des Antihelden Kain, der sich auf den Weg gemacht hat, grausame Rache zu nehmen und den unstillbaren Durst nach Blut zu befriedigen. Hardcore-Splatter mit Blutorgien, zerfetzten Leibern, abgehackten Extremitäten und Jungfrauen.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Bloody Roar 2 - Bringer of the New Age (Europe).cue
game.name: Bloody Roar 2 : Bringer of the New Age
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Bloody Roar 2 - Bringer of the New Age (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Bloody Roar 2 - Bringer of the New Age (Europe).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Bloody Roar 2 - Bringer of the New Age (Europe).mp4
game.desc: Ein Mensch wird schneller zur gnadenlosen Bestie als man denkt. Bei Bloody Roar 2 - Bringer Of The New Age treten 10 Menschen ins Rampenlicht, die mit einer besonderen Begabung ausgestattet sind. Jeder der außergewöhnlichen Einzelkämpfer ist in der Lage, sich in bestimmten Situationen für einen begrenzten Zeitraum in eine Kreatur aus dem Reich der Tiere zu verwandeln. Wenn einer dieser Einzelkämpfer in einem Zweikampf in Rage gerät, ist er nicht mehr zu bremsen. Blitzschnelle Schlagkombinationen und unglaubliches Reaktionsvermögen zeichnet die animalischen Fighter aus. Hudson Soft hat einmal mehr alles daran gesetzt, einen neuen Maßstab im heißumkämpften Prügelspielgenre zu setzen. Die komplexen Game-Mechanics, die einfallsreichen Special-Moves sowie das faszinierende, Anime-inspirierte Charakter-Design machen Bloody Roar 2 zum Genre-Highlight.

game.name: Bloody Roar : Hyper Beast Duel
game.desc: Am Ende des 20. Jahrhunderts wird die Welt von einer nahen Katastrophe bedroht, die die gesamte Menschheit mit Angst erfüllt. Inmitten dieser Krise tauchen plötzlich Personen mit außergewöhnlichen Fähigkeiten auf. Ihre physische Stärke und ihre athletischen Talente überschreiten alles bisher dagewesene. Diese einzigartigen Personen zeichnen sich durch ihre Tapferkeit im Kampf aus, jeder ausbildeten Kämpfer , der Zeuge ihrer ungewöhnlichen Fähigkeiten wurde das starke Verlagen lieber zu fliehen als sich ihnen im Kampf zu stellen. Die Kampfexperten fürchten aber nicht nur die Stärke der Geschöpfe, sondern auch ihre Fähigkeit sich in der Hitze des Kampfes mit hilfe von kraftvollen Lichtkaskaden in Wesen halb Mensch, halb Tier zu verwandeln.

game.name: Bloody Roar : Hyper Beast Duel
game.desc: Am Ende des 20. Jahrhunderts wird die Welt von einer nahen Katastrophe bedroht, die die gesamte Menschheit mit Angst erfüllt. Inmitten dieser Krise tauchen plötzlich Personen mit außergewöhnlichen Fähigkeiten auf. Ihre physische Stärke und ihre athletischen Talente überschreiten alles bisher dagewesene. Diese einzigartigen Personen zeichnen sich durch ihre Tapferkeit im Kampf aus, jeder ausbildeten Kämpfer , der Zeuge ihrer ungewöhnlichen Fähigkeiten wurde das starke Verlagen lieber zu fliehen als sich ihnen im Kampf zu stellen. Die Kampfexperten fürchten aber nicht nur die Stärke der Geschöpfe, sondern auch ihre Fähigkeit sich in der Hitze des Kampfes mit hilfe von kraftvollen Lichtkaskaden in Wesen halb Mensch, halb Tier zu verwandeln.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Bob the Builder - Can We Fix It (Europe).cue
game.name: Bob the Builder : Can We Fix It
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Bob the Builder - Can We Fix It (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Bob the Builder - Can We Fix It (Europe).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Bob the Builder - Can We Fix It (Europe).mp4
game.desc: Bob der Baumeister steht in Bob the Builder - Can We Fix It? vor einer aufregenden, neuen Herausforderung! Der Bürgermeister hat Bob gebeten, das neue Sportzentrum der Stadt zu bauen. Es ist ein brillanter Job, aber es gibt ein kleines Problem - Bob hat nur einen Tag Zeit, um die Arbeit durchzuführen! Wendy und alle anderen Freunde helfen in Bob the Builder - Can We Fix It? mit (selbst die faule Kuschel!), doch die Aufgabe ist immer noch zu gewaltig. Bob benötigt Deine Hilfe - kannst du ihm helfen? Ja, das kannst du! Bob the Builder - Can We Fix It? ist einfach zu spielen - ohne elterliche Aufsicht für Jungen und Mädchen.

game.name: Bomberman
game.desc: Bomberman gehört für Viele zu den besten Multiplayer-Spielen aller Zeiten. Es basiert auf einem einfachen Credo: Bombe die Gegner weg, bevor sie dasselbe mit Dir tun können. Das Labyrinth wird zum gefährlichen Schauplatz explosiver Auseinandersetzungen. Hier kann man noch für die gute Sache kämpfen: Rette die Welt vor wahnsinnigen Bombenlegern. Das wird jeden Spiele-Fan begeistern: Nach Bomberman World, Bomberman Wars und Bomberman Fantasy Racing kommt Bomberman jetzt erstmals im beliebten Original-2D-Style auf die Playstation. Dieser Klassiker bringt das alte Gamer-Fieber zurück, verfeinert mit der Dual-Shock-Unterstützung. Auf den unermüdlichen Kämpfer warten 59 Level inklusive der Original-Super Nintendo-Level. Das ganze ist im Battle Mode und Full Multi Player Mode zu genießen.

game.name: Bomberman Fantasy Race
game.desc: Bomberman startet jetzt richtig durch. Rauf auf die Rennpiste und mit Vollgas und einer Hand voll Bomben die Gegner das Fürchten lehren! Das ist 3D-Racing kombiniert mit rasanten Bomben-Fighting und erstklassigen fantasievollen Graphiken. Alle Rennstrecken sind komplett verschieden und beeindrucken mit herrlichen Kulissen. Bei der Jagd durch Haarnadelkurven und Vollgas-Geraden schießt man vorbei an verschneiten Bergen, Achterbahnen und Schlössern. Sechs Charaktere stehen zur Auswahl und man kann sogar auf das Rennergebnis wetten, um noch mehr Geld für Bomben zu bekommen. Dual-Shock-Unterstützung und starker Sound werden alle Bomberman-Fans erfreuen. nnFEATURES: - 7 Rennstrecken, die umkehrbar sind - 15 verschiedene Power Ups - Remix der Original Bomberman-Songs - Splitscreen-Versus-Modus

game.name: Bomberman World
game.desc: Das klassische Puzzle-Abenteuer für die Playstation mit vollkommen neuen Welten, die es zu erobern gilt. Jagen sie ihre Gegner in die Luft, bevor sie ihnen an den Kragen gehen! Verrückte, witzige Action.

game.name: Bombing Islands, The
game.desc:
Clown World is in trouble. Mysterious blue bombs have appeared all over the planet, and King Clown needs help. In a royal decree, the king beckons for Kid Clown, a hero of past Kemco games, to clean up these bombs in all six continents. The strange, yet brave little clown sets out to blast the bombs away before the planet explodes.
Clearing these bombs will not always be easy, as they have been arranged in puzzles across 60 different levels. Kid Clown must act wisely, because each level has only one igniter bomb that can detonate the bombs surrounding it. To successfully complete a level in one try, Kid Clown must arrange the bombs so that a chain reaction takes place. He also has to get a safe distance away from the reaction or he will explode.

game.name: Box Champions 2000
game.desc: Ever dreamed of fighting in the "Thrilla in Manilla?" Now you can! In Knockout Kings 2000, EA Sports has included a Classic Fights feature. Some of the greatest matches of all time are playable, with no set outcomes. You can fight as the boxers or create your own greatest fights ever by taking on the persona of over 50 of the greatest boxers of all time, including their statistics. From Ali and Frazier to Holyfield and Butterbean. In addition to the Classic Fights feature, you can take part in any number of modes. From the no-holds barred Exhibition mode to the Slugfest and Career modes, you have a chock-full of choices.

game.name: Box Champions 2001
game.desc: Men aren't the only ones looking for a fight in Knockout Kings 2001, the first boxing game from EA SPORTS to feature women boxers. The best male fighters are also on hand to settle who's the greatest of all time. The lineup of legends includes Ali, Frazier, Louis, Chavez, Marciano and many more. Players also have the ability to create a boxer with their own personalized style and vie for the light, middleweight or heavyweight titles. Teddy Atlas and Al Bernstein offer ringside commentary, and Mills Lane is one of the referees. Choose from a varying style of boxers and enter the career mode. End each round with the advice of the new corner man ringing in your ears. Watch that face and get your cuts man to iron down that swelling. All this adds yet more realism in this bone-crunching fist fest. The improvements continue with the training, an easy introduction to all the basic punches and all the extra combinations giving you all you need to take on those contenders.

game.name: Box-Champions
game.desc: EA SPORTS' boxing franchise, features a variety of boxers to choose from as they compete in a Career, Slugfest or two-player Versus Mode: Muhammad Ali, Oscar De La Hoya, Sugar Ray Leonard, Joe Frazier, Shane Mosley, Michael Grant, Lennox Lewis, Floyd Mayweather and Rocky Marciano. Slugfest Mode has you competing against computer opponents in a ladder-style series of bouts. Career Mode lets you create a boxer and travel to different venues in order to make a name for yourself. By winning each venue, you'll be able to move one step closer to the ultimate fight: your created boxer versus "The Greatest" himself, Muhammad Ali! As you progress through your career, you'll be able to improve your fighter's overall ratings in strength, speed and stamina. Mills Lane reprises his role as the videogame referee who will encourage boxers to 'get it on' in digitized speech. Options include the ability to toggle TKOs (knock down a fighter three times in a row and the fight will end) and use power-ups (collect gloves to boost strength, shoes to improve speed and bottles to increase stamina).

game.name: Brahma Force
game.desc: A mech-based FPS; pilot your Bipedal Robotic Assault Heavy Mechanized Armor (built by Bronx Industries, of course) through the Beltlogger 9 excavation colony. Discover what happened to the Beltlogger 9 colony- it may be related to the events on Probe Ship Mina 3, wherein a lone person apparently under the control of an outside intelligence slaughtered his shipmates.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Bratz - Dress Up, Get Down and Be a Bratz Superstar! (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).cue
game.name: Bratz : Dress Up, Get Down and Be a Bratz Superstar!
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Bratz - Dress Up, Get Down and Be a Bratz Superstar! (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Bratz - Dress Up, Get Down and Be a Bratz Superstar! (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Bratz - Dress Up, Get Down and Be a Bratz Superstar! (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).mp4
game.desc: Based on MGA Entertainment's series of toy dolls with "a passion for fashion," this PS game brings the Bratz characters together in an adventure designed for girls of all ages. Unlike more traditional dolls such as Barbie, Bratz features a style inspired by Japanese anime and hip-hop fashion. The characters also come from a variety of ethnic backgrounds, which has helped fuel the popularity of the franchise. Bratz dolls were awarded the People's Choice for Toy of the Year Award at the 2002 Toy Fair.

game.name: Break Out
game.desc: An updated remake of the 1976 Arcade classic of the same name, Breakout for the PlayStation dispenses with the simplistic lines and dots of the original game and adds power-ups, 3D interactive worlds, multiple levels (that must be unlocked) and, of course, a storyline. Only the basic objective remains the same: maneuvering a paddle to keep a ball in play so it can ricochet off a wall of bricks (or other items in this case), effectively eliminating the bricks from the playfield. The Breakout world of 2000 is an island filled with bizarre creatures in the form of paddles and balls. Bouncer enjoys his life their with Daisy, his beautiful girlfriend. All was fine in paradise until one day when Bouncer took a swim out to sea to rescue a ball. While Bouncer was gone, the evil Batnix and his henchmen kidnapped Daisy.

game.name: Break Point
game.desc: Hard to hit serves, blistering backhands, forehand smashes, and touch volleys come to the PlayStation with BREAK POINT TENNIS. Take control of one of eight different players, and become an international champion. You will have to play in eight unique stadiums on four different surfaces (grass, clay, indoor, and asphalt). While competing in a match, you?ll notice that the players look and move realistically thanks to 3D graphics and motion capture animation. When a call is close, you can view an instant replay to see if the umpire got the call right. When your friends come over, you can have up to four players going at it in a doubles match. Experience tennis like never before with BREAK POINT TENNIS.

game.name: Breath Of Fire 3
game.desc: Ein in Flammen auferstandener Drache, ein kleiner Junge auf der Flucht, eine Fügung entfaltet sich. Der Letzte einer erloschenen Rasse, einer mit ungeahnten Kräften. Ryu ist ein schlafender Drache, von Bergleuten erweckt, verwandelt in ein argloses Kind. Nun muss Ryu sich seiner Kräfte erinnern, um sein Schicksal zu erfüllen.

game.name: Breath Of Fire 3
game.desc: Ein in Flammen auferstandener Drache, ein kleiner Junge auf der Flucht, eine Fügung entfaltet sich. Der Letzte einer erloschenen Rasse, einer mit ungeahnten Kräften. Ryu ist ein schlafender Drache, von Bergleuten erweckt, verwandelt in ein argloses Kind. Nun muss Ryu sich seiner Kräfte erinnern, um sein Schicksal zu erfüllen.

game.name: Breath of Fire IV
game.desc: Eine Prinzessin. Zwei Länder im Krieg. Eine epische Suche nach Frieden. Nach Jahrhunderten voller Kriege haben die beiden Länder, die an ein undurchdringliches Sumpfland grenzen, endlich einen Waffenstillstand vereinbart. Auf mysteriöse Weise verschwindet die edle Prinzessin Elena irgendwo in der Nähe der kriegsverwüsteten Front. Verzweifelt macht sich ihre Schwester Nina alleine auf die Suche nach der Prinzessin. Auf ihrer Reise trifft sie auf einem geheimnisvollen jungen Krieger namen Ryu. Schon bald sind die beiden durch ihr Schicksal verbunden. Das nächste Kapitel dieser epischen Geschichte um Zauber und Mythen wird nun aufgeschlagen. Das Schicksal und die Zukunft liegen in ihren Händen.

game.name: Brian Lara Cricket
game.desc: Brian Lara Cricket is the first in a series of cricket games to be endorsed by Brian Lara. There have been more games in the series, Brian Lara Cricket '96, Brian Lara Cricket '99, Brian Lara International Cricket 2005 and Brian Lara International Cricket 2007. Brian Lara Cricket was released on the PC in 1994 for DOS and Sega Mega Drive and Amiga in 1995 by Codemasters. The game was also rereleased in 1999 under the Codemaster Classics brand for Windows. It was developed by Audiogenic. The Mega Drive version spent 10 weeks at number 1 in the UK games charts during the summer of 1995. The game is a rebranded version of Graham Gooch World Class Cricket.

game.name: Broken Helix
game.desc:
Broken Helix puts you in the boots of an armed marine of a special forces team. You are sent in to a military base which has been taken over by terrorists for unknown reasons.
The main character is voiced by Bruce Campbell, star of the Evil Dead movies. Throughout the game, he makes wisecracks and one-liners, and dialogue with personnel is generally comical.
Broken Helix is considered a 4D game. For example, if you are on the third floor, you may have to make your way up to the fifth floor in order to defuse a bomb. There is no visible time limit, but if you do not make it up to that floor in time, the bomb will go off, and you will die.
There are various objectives to complete, such as disarming bombs and finding certain items, but the game is mostly action/adventure, searching for keys to open doors.
In order to be successful, you must sneak past cameras and other devices, in order to find out the truth behind the terrorist takeover.

game.name: Broken Helix
game.desc:
Broken Helix puts you in the boots of an armed marine of a special forces team. You are sent in to a military base which has been taken over by terrorists for unknown reasons.
The main character is voiced by Bruce Campbell, star of the Evil Dead movies. Throughout the game, he makes wisecracks and one-liners, and dialogue with personnel is generally comical.
Broken Helix is considered a 4D game. For example, if you are on the third floor, you may have to make your way up to the fifth floor in order to defuse a bomb. There is no visible time limit, but if you do not make it up to that floor in time, the bomb will go off, and you will die.
There are various objectives to complete, such as disarming bombs and finding certain items, but the game is mostly action/adventure, searching for keys to open doors.
In order to be successful, you must sneak past cameras and other devices, in order to find out the truth behind the terrorist takeover.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Broken Sword - The Shadow of the Templars (Europe).cue
game.name: Broken Sword : The Shadow of the Templars
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Broken Sword - The Shadow of the Templars (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Broken Sword - The Shadow of the Templars (Europe).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Broken Sword - The Shadow of the Templars (Europe).mp4
game.desc:
Der Amerikaner George Stobbart (gesprochen von Alexander Schottky) verbringt die Herbstzeit im Urlaub in Paris und genießt das Flair eines Straßencafés, als ein Clown das Café betritt. Kurze Zeit später kommt der Clown wieder herausgelaufen und es kommt zu einer Bombenexplosion, die das Café verwüstet und einen Gast tötet. Als George auf eigene Faust zu ermitteln beginnt, lernt er die französische Journalistin Nicole Collard (Franziska Pigulla) kennen und findet mit ihr heraus, dass hinter dem Mord ein gewisser Khan steckt, der dem alten Geheimbund der Hashshashin angehört. Diese wollen verhindern, dass der ebenfalls im Geheimen operierende Templerorden die Beschwörung des Dämons Baphomet erfolgreich vollziehen kann.
Das Abenteuer findet zum größten Teil in Paris statt, zwischendurch reist George jedoch auch nach Irland, Spanien, Syrien und Schottland. Während des Erlebnisses kommen sich George und Nicole persönlich näher.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Broken Sword II - The Smoking Mirror (Europe).cue
game.name: Broken Sword II : The Smoking Mirror
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Broken Sword II - The Smoking Mirror (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Broken Sword II - The Smoking Mirror (Europe).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Broken Sword II - The Smoking Mirror (Europe).mp4
game.desc: Follow the breathtaking tale of George Stobbard as he circles the globe trying to rescue Nico, his investigative reporter girlfriend. Their adventure leads not only to the heart of a ruthless Central American crime syndicate but back to the arcane power of the ancient civilization of the Mayan civilization.

game.name: Brunswick Circuit Pro Bowling
game.desc: Bowling. A sport that depends more on talent and raw wrist power than actual physical conditioning. A sport that can be so laid back that there's even a section of it that involves buying beer. While THQ can't bring you a six-pack when you throw a strike on the seventh frame, it does manage to deliver an extremely realistic bowling title, complete with some of the best big-money bowlers in the world today. You have the opportunity to create your own bowler or choose one of the 13 Brunswick Pro Staff bowlers. But be warned because these bowlers are tough stuff and will tell you right away that they own the alley. With different gameplay modes to choose from, you can select Exhibition to get going quickly, or a Skins game for big money. There's also tournament mode, career mode and cosmic bowling, which turn the lane into a discotheque. The lane's realistically oiled, which forces you to move around the lane and change your rolls as the conditions change.

game.name: Brunswick Circuit Pro Bowling 2
game.desc: Brunswick Circuit Pro Bowling 2 for the PlayStation is the sequel to the bowling simulation Brunswick Circuit Pro Bowling. Developed by Adrenalin Entertainment, the game combines the refinements of the original with new and improved features, including updated Brunswick Pro Staff, new tournaments, expanded multi-player support, new modes of play and a completely overhauled Create-A-Bowler feature. From amateur to professional, Brunswick Circuit Pro Bowling 2 offers enthusiasts realistic bowling in the comfort of their own homes. The game features true-to-life elements including authentic Brunswick lane environments, clothing, equipment and statistics, real tournaments from the PBA (Professional Bowling Association) tour and accurate bowling ball and pin physics.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Bubble Bobble also featuring Rainbow Islands (Europe).cue
game.name: Bubble Bobble also featuring Rainbow Islands
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Bubble Bobble also featuring Rainbow Islands (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Bubble Bobble also featuring Rainbow Islands (Europe).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Bubble Bobble also featuring Rainbow Islands (Europe).mp4
game.desc: Bubble Bobble is an arcade game by Taito, first released in 1986 and later ported to numerous home computers and game consoles. The game, starring the twin Bubble Dragons Bub and Bob, is an action-platform game in which players travel through one hundred different stages, blowing and bursting bubbles, avoiding enemies and collecting a variety of items. The game became very popular and led to a long series of sequels and spin-offs. The main goal of the game is to rescue Bub and Bob's girlfriends from big wind-up toasters, among other enemies. It is also notable for being an early example of a game with multiple endings, which depended on the player's skill and discovering secrets. One or two players attempt to save their friends in this re-release of the 1987 classic puzzle/action game. Players blow bubbles to trap enemies. When they pop the bubbles, fruit comes out and the players compete for the points. If they don't pop the bubbles in time, the enemies escape and become faster.

game.name: Bubsy 3D : Furbitten Planet
game.desc: Bubsy 3D: Furbitten Planet, also known simply as Bubsy 3D, is a platform video game developed by Eidetic and published by Accolade and Telstar for the PlayStation video game console. Designed by Michael Berlyn, it was released on October 13, 1996 in North America and in August 1997 in Europe. It is the fourth and final game in the Bubsy series, starring its eponymous protagonist. It is one of the first 3D platform games, though with limited movement. The game's complete name is a parody of Forbidden Planet, a 1956 sci-fi film. A Sega Saturn version was planned but was cancelled. The game was very poorly received and was regarded as one of the worst games of all time by GameTrailers, IGN, GamesRadar, and humorist Seanbaby. Many of the major elements of the game received criticism; it has been criticized for its graphics, its controls, and the personality of Bubsy, the latter which IGN felt was ruined from the previous Bubsy games. It holds an aggregate score of 50.90% at Game Rankings based on five reviews. Berlyn attributes its low quality to its release coinciding with Super Mario 64, which he found to be far superior; however, due to development being nearly done and Accolade wanting it to be released, there was no time to improve upon it.

game.name: Buggy
game.desc: Buggy is a racing game where you drive a small radio controlled car. The player can choose between 12 different cars (some have to be unlocked) to control. The game consists of 16 levels and a number of bonus levels. There are three game modes: Time attack, Challenge 1 and Challenge 2. In Time Attack you compete against yourself for new personal records. At the beginning not all levels are available in this mode, they have to be unlocked by completing certain levels in Challenge 1. Challenge 2 is not available until Challenge 1 is completed. The second challenge contains all the levels from the first challenge plus some new ones.

game.name: Bugriders : The Race of Kings
game.desc: The King of Entymion, Leptus, is about to die. Rather than hold elections or keep the tradition of primogeniture, the next king will be chosen with a race. Not just any race, but a race in which the participants ride on giant bugs. Choose from 22 different contestants, each with unique racing styles and weapon, and try to be the first to the finish line on six tracks. If finishing first is a little too tough, make your bug go faster by using your riding crop. But be careful, or your bug will quit running for you. For those looking for a less-than-honest way to win, collect power-ups and weapons scattered throughout the track to blow past your opponents or blast them out of the sky. And don't forget to keep your eyes open for the shortcuts in each track. Do you have the nerve and the skill to win the Great Race? Play BUG RIDERS: The Race of Kings and find out.

game.name: Bugs Bunny & Taz : Time Busters
game.desc:
Erlebe das lustigste aller Zeichentrick-Duos, Bugs Bunny und den Tasmanische Teufel, in seiner ersten gemeinsamen Videospiel-Zeitreise voller Action und Abenteuer!
Übernimm, wann immer du willst, die Rolle von Bugs Bunny und Taz, den beiden beliebtesten Zeichentrickfiguren der Welt, um mit ihnen alle Hindernisse und Widersacher zu überwinden.
Nimm es mit klassischen Gegnern aus der Welt der Looney Tunes auf: Yosemite Sam, Elmer Fudd, Babba Chop und Graf Bloodcount.
Erkunde 4 aufregende Zeitperioden: Die Ära der Azteken, der Wikinger, der Arabischen Nächte und Transsilvaniens.
Hab Spaß in mehr als 30 Levels mit Sportwettbewerben, Missionen, Endgegnern und wilden Verfolgungsjagden.
Teile den Spaß mit einem Freund in dem echten kooperativen Modus für 2 Spieler auf der Playstation.

game.name: Bugs Bunny : Lost in Time
game.desc:
Platz da für den verrücktesten Hasen, den die Playstation je gesehen hat! Mit "Bugs Bunny auf Zeitreise" präsentieren Sie Ihren Kunden ein absolut abwechslungsreiches und lustiges Jump'n Run Adventure, das für Furore unter den Game-Fans sorgt. Stürz Dich mit Bugs Bunny in sein allererstes 3D Abenteuer. Aber halt Dich fest, denn Bugs hat versehentlich eine Zeitmaschine gestartet. Spring kopfüber in Hasenlöcher, grabe unterirdische Tunnel, überliste Elmer, fahre mit einem Oldtimer-Cabrio spazieren, oder schwirr mit Deinen Ohren wie ein Hubschrauber durch die Luft.
FEATURES: - Du begegnest zwölf der berühmtesten Looney Tunes-Figuren wie Elmer Fudd, Hazel der Hexe, Yosemite Sam, Rocky und Mugsy sowie Marvin der Marsmensch - Alle Charaktere mit Originalstimmen - Perfekte Mischung aus Comic-Humor und packender Action - 21 aufregende Level sowie ein zusätzliches Trainingslevel - 5 aufregende Zeiten: Steinzeit, Mittelalter, Zeitalter der Piraten, die 30er Jahre und die DimensionX - Variantenreiches Gameplay mit Puzzle-, Renn-, Action- und Entdeckungssequenzen und nicht-linearem Spielverlauf - Über 20 verschiedene, Bugs-Bunny-typische Bewegungsmöglichkeiten des Helden - Faszinierende 3D-Umgebung und 360°-Kameraführung für First-Person-Perspektive

game.name: Bundesliga 2000 : Der Fussball-Manager
game.desc: The FA Premier League Football Manager 2000 is the first sequel to The FA Premier League Football Manager 99. It was developed by Krisalis Software and released in 1999. Bringing the world of football management to the PlayStation, The F.A. Premier League Football Manager 2000 allows you to take control of any football team within the 4 English football divisions with all the right player and manager names for the 2000 season. Control everything from changing match tactics and team formations, buying and selling players on the transfer market, dealing with the finances, team building including training and youth club training. All designed for the PlayStation control system allowing simple fast access to the game without tedious learning of control systems and sub menus associated with PC management games. This is a pick up and play football manager game for the console market. Features: Exclusive knowledge of player contracts. In-game 3-D action sequences. Includes all four English leagues. Buy, sell, loan or borrow players from across the leagues. Check the performance of any team in the database. Formation and game plan before the match.

game.name: Bundesliga Stars 2000
