The story begins in 1997. It's the dead of night in the city of Los Angeles, and there has been a mass murder at a general hospital on the outskirts of downtown. The perpetrator is the director of the hospital, Richter Harris. He has shut himself up in the hospital and taken a number of patients as hostages, leaving the police helpless and unable to move in. Richter's only daughter, Laura Harris, after hearing the situation, rushes to Los Angeles from San Francisco, and drives alone to the tragic scene at the hospital ground. Upon entering the hospital Laura finds herself transported to an old mansion, while the disembodied voice of her father pleads with her to leave. Nevertheless she must press forward to save her father and herself.
D is a puzzle game requiring Laura to solve esoteric inventory puzzles on a very strict time limit. Each of the game's four discs must be completed in about thirty minutes each, and saving is not an option. The time is kept track of using Laura's pocket watch. The pocket watch can also be used to supply hints for puzzles, but after three uses the glass will shatter and it will stop working. The game also has multiple endings.

game.name: D
game.desc:
The story begins in 1997. It's the dead of night in the city of Los Angeles, and there has been a mass murder at a general hospital on the outskirts of downtown. The perpetrator is the director of the hospital, Richter Harris. He has shut himself up in the hospital and taken a number of patients as hostages, leaving the police helpless and unable to move in. Richter's only daughter, Laura Harris, after hearing the situation, rushes to Los Angeles from San Francisco, and drives alone to the tragic scene at the hospital ground. Upon entering the hospital Laura finds herself transported to an old mansion, while the disembodied voice of her father pleads with her to leave. Nevertheless she must press forward to save her father and herself.
D is a puzzle game requiring Laura to solve esoteric inventory puzzles on a very strict time limit. Each of the game's four discs must be completed in about thirty minutes each, and saving is not an option. The time is kept track of using Laura's pocket watch. The pocket watch can also be used to supply hints for puzzles, but after three uses the glass will shatter and it will stop working. The game also has multiple endings.

game.name: Dalmatians 2
game.desc:
Dalmatians 2 ist das Sequel The Dalmatians und ist ein weiteres PSX Game von The Code Monkeys das nach dem Scheme abläuft: - Billigster Cartoon Film Ripoff eines beliebten Films - Billige Rätsel - Malbücher.
Kinder sind dafür bekannt, dass sie die Spiele ihren Eltern hinterher geworfen haben...

game.name: Dalmatians, The
game.desc:
Follow a cuddly Dalmatian puppy and his wild-dog friends in the search for his missing sister. As well as a great half-hour cartoon video, Dalmatians features an easy-to-use virtual colouring book and a challenging puzzle game.
Dalmatians is a story that all children will treasure.
Features: First person perspective. 2D graphics Cartoon graphics Fantasy theme.

game.name: Dance - Uk Extra Trax
game.desc: Released back in October 2003, Broadsword Interactive's thumb in the proverbial Bemani pie brought the average living room dancing queen pretty much everything they could wish for. Dance: UK delivered not only a large selection of popular chart hits along to which you could strut your stuff, but also a unique 8-way dance mat and a selection of accompanying peripherals, such as a 2.1 sound system and a rather snazzy microphone headset. In addition, the game also promised the ability to add new songs without the cost of having to buy a new full price game. Well, in case you hadn't already guessed, eXtra Trax is precisely what was promised, adding a host of, erm, extra tracks to your beloved Dance: UK experience.

game.name: Dance Europe
game.desc: Dance Europe takes the standard 'bemani' formula - arrows appear rhythmically on screen and the player must hit the corresponding button (on either a dance mat peripheral or the standard PS/PS2 controller) in time with these arrows and the music. Points are awarded for accuracy with extras for making certain 'combos' (mini-routines within a song which are deemed especially difficult or long). The game has tracks by artists including Sugababes, Room 5, Sophie Ellis Bextor, Alizee or DJ Sammy.

game.name: Dance Europe
game.desc: Dance Europe takes the standard 'bemani' formula - arrows appear rhythmically on screen and the player must hit the corresponding button (on either a dance mat peripheral or the standard PS/PS2 controller) in time with these arrows and the music. Points are awarded for accuracy with extras for making certain 'combos' (mini-routines within a song which are deemed especially difficult or long). The game has tracks by artists including Sugababes, Room 5, Sophie Ellis Bextor, Alizee or DJ Sammy.

game.name: Dancing Stage : Disney Mix
game.desc:
The revolution continues with Dance Dance Revolution Disney Mix. Featuring your favorite Disney characters and dance mixes of popular Disney tunes, this is the hottest dancing game this side of Magic Kingdom. Get ready to heat up the dance floor and put your skills to the test as you move to the groove. Let Mickey and his friends make your dreams come true as you become a star.
- Dance to high-energy remixes of popular Disney tunes, including It's A Small World, Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Dah, and Mickey Mouse March. - Select from your favorite Disney characters, including Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck, Goofy and more! - Re-create the DDR experience with Konami's Dance Dance Revolution controller (sold seperately). - Special Work Out features let you have fun getting in shape - while tracking the calories you burn. - Multiple difficulty settings makes DDR Disney Mix easy to learn for all ages.

game.name: Dancing Stage : Euromix
game.desc: Was Karaoke für den Fernseher ist, ist Dancing Stage für die Konsole. Streifen Sie ihre Party-Klamotten über und rein in die Tanzschuhe für das coolste und funkigste Spiel der Videospielgeschichte. Dancing Stage alias Dance Dance Revolution hat die japanischen Spielhallen im Sturm erobert und weltweit für Aufsehen gesorgt. Jetzt ist dieser Hit endlich in Europa für die Playstation erhältlich. Hier wird jeder zum coolen Disco-Tänzer. Schließen Sie die separat erhältliche Tanzmatte an und lassen Sie den Rhythmus grooven! FEATURES: - Einzigartiges, innovatives Spielkonzept für 1-2 Spieler gleichzeitig - Neue Tracks exklusiv für die europäische Version, z.B.: Gloria Gaynor "I will survive", Cameo "Word up", The Buggles "Video killed the Radio star", Boyzone "So good". Insgesamt 24 Stücke der Extraklasse - Lassen Sie sich den Kalorienverbrauch während des Tanzens anzeigen - Absoluter Party-Knaller

game.name: Dancing Stage : Party Edition
game.desc: Dancing Stage Party Edition is a home video game in the Dancing Stage series, the European counterpart to Dance Dance Revolution Konamix. It was released in 2002 by Konami, as part of their family-oriented 'Bemani' series. The game is based on the Dance Dance Revolution 4th Mix engine, follow on-screen arrows to learn the steps or create your own original dance routine. Features four gameplay modes - training, practice, arcade and workout (with calorie counter). The game features 51 songs in total, most of which were written for the game, or developed from Dancing Stage EuroMix. Five of the songs included are by mainstream artists and their titles are coloured yellow in-game, distinguishing them from the other tracks.

game.name: Dancing Stage Fever
game.desc: Dancing Stage Fever is a home video game in the Dancing Stage series, the European counterpart to Dance Dance Revolution. It was released in Europe and part of Asia in October 2003 by Konami, as part of its family-oriented 'Bemani' series. It was released in both a PlayStation 2 and a PlayStation version at the same time. The latest addition to the popular series of dancing games, Dancing Stage Fever not only offers another welcome opportunity to get your dance mat hooked up to your PlayStation, but also throws in some new goodies to keep your feet moving that bit longer. The crux of the game is the same as always. In time with the directions on screen, you need to make sure your foot hits the appropriate symbol at the right time. The more accurate you are, the better you will do. You can still play the game with a standard control pad, incidentally, but it's a fruitless exercise, especially when you consider just how cheap a dance mat is.

game.name: Dancing Stage Fusion
game.desc: Dancing Stage Fusion, abbreviated DS Fusion or simply Fusion, is a music video game released by Konami to the European PlayStation and PlayStation 2 gaming audience on November 5, 2004. In April of the following year, Dancing Stage Fusion was released as an arcade game. Fusion featured new gameplay features such as EyeToy support for the PlayStation 2 release as well as new music from hit pop artists. The arcade version of Fusion was the first arcade machine in Europe since Dancing Stage EuroMix 2 and set a milestone as the first Dance Dance Revolution arcade machine produced by Konami since Dance Dance Revolution Extreme in 2001. The arcade release marked a total game engine upgrade from the old PlayStation-based boards to a new system built on top of an off-the-shelf PlayStation 2. This hardware upgrade would be later featured in the global release of Dance Dance Revolution SuperNova in 2006.

game.name: Danger Girl
game.desc:
3rd Person Action game based on the hit comic book from J.Scott Campbell.
In Danger Girl, you play as one of three sexy, adventurous, feminine agents with a wide array of weapons and spy gear. Choose between Abbey Chase, the blond team leader; Sydney, a sharpshooter from Australia; and a character who is new to the series. You'll travel all over the world in 14 levels and explore vast outdoor and indoor areas in six different environments. The game features a wide variety of play mechanics and numerous prerendered interstitial scenes that advance a story line that takes place between the first and second story arcs of the comic book.

game.name: Darklight Conflict
game.desc: You were the greatest fighter pilot the world had ever known until a flash of light took you away from your plane. After awakening from a deep sleep, you realize you are no longer flying through the Earth's blue skies--you're not even human! Aliens have infected your blood with their DNA to get you to fight on their side. These aliens, referred to as Reptons, are locked in a bitter struggle against the Ovons to decide the fate of their galaxy. Since the Reptons desperately need your skills, they have been kind enough to genetically fuse your body with one of their ships. Darklight Conflict lets you fly over 50 single player missions to rid the galaxy of the dreaded Ovons. Missions range from dogfights, bombing runs, defending ships, as well as rescue and intelligence operations. Real-time lens flares and light sourcing will make the battles come alive, while 14 different weapons prepare you for whatever the enemy has in store. Throughout your adventure you'll have the opportunity to pilot different ships, some of which include bombers, gunships and fighters. Perhaps you'll be sent back home if you're successful...

game.name: Darkstalkers 3
game.desc:
This is the 3rd in the Darkstalkers series (the 2nd, Night Warriors: Darkstalkers' Revenge, was published only for the Sega Saturn in the US.) It plays much the same as the first, but features better animation, more playable characters, and a deeper storyline.
Jedah, the "Lord of Vampire", has summoned all of the Night Warriors to his realm to be assimilated into his being. Of course, this serves as a great excuse to have more one-on-one fights...
Play as Jedah, B. B. Hood, Q-Bee, Lilith, Demitri, Morrigan, Anakaris, Victor, L. Raptor, Hsien-Ko, J. Talbain, Felicia, Rikuo, Sasquatch, Bishamon, Donovan, Pyron or Huitzil, and conquer the enemy.

game.name: Darkstalkers : The Night Warriors
game.desc: Darkstalkers, known in Japan as Vampire, is a series of 2D fighting games developed and published by Capcom, beginning with Darkstalkers: The Night Warriors (Vampire: The Night Warriors) in 1994. The series is set in a pastiche Gothic horror universe and features a highly stylized, cartoonish graphic style. It features characters based on either various kinds of monsters (the titular "darkstalkers") or their hunters, who are all engaging in combat against each other. Darkstalkers introduced many of the concepts used in later Capcom fighting games, including its first use of 16-bit color animation sprites and gameplay mechanics later employed in the Street Fighter Alpha and Marvel vs. Capcom series.

game.name: Darkstone : Evil Reigns
game.desc:
In Darkstone, you are the chosen one to counter Draak's plan to plunge the world into a new Age of Darkness. Character choices are made from four classes (wizard/sorceress, assassin/thief, warrior/amazon or monk/priestess). The overall objective is to track down the seven crystals of the Time Orb, created a millennium ago from the tears of the benevolent goddess Kaliba and restore it. Only then will you have the power of the mighty Orb at your disposal to use as the ultimate weapon against Draak.
By the numbers, Darkstone contains four distinct regions of Uma, more than 100 evil creatures based on 30 types of characters, 32 specific spells and nearly two dozen skills (six major). Additional features include full 360-degree movement, more than 30 weapons (some multi-purposed), numerous items and traps and over 200 enemies and characters with which to interact.

game.name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX
game.desc: Tony Hawk proved the skating games can work to great effect. Now Dave Mirra is here to prove that BMX is here to stay, thanks to the boys at Acclaim Entertainment. Choose from all of the current crop of BMX champs, including 10 times world champion Dave Mirra, Ryan Nyquist, Joey Garcia, Shaun Butler & heaps more, and ride your way through 12 highly detailed environments, with vert ramps, huge jumps and track racing. Multiplayer gaming is also thrown in, allowing two players to go head-to-head in a game of B-M-X (a unique variation of the HORSE basketball game). All this plus official sponsors clothing, bikes and advertising boards plus a huge soundtrack featuring Cypress Hill, Deftones and more.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX - Maximum Remix (Europe).cue
game.name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX : Maximum Remix
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX - Maximum Remix (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX - Maximum Remix (Europe).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX - Maximum Remix (Europe).mp4
game.desc:
The ultimate BMX gaming experience is here! Maximum Remix includes the entire best-selling Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX game plus more of what you asked for--more levels, more modes, more riders--it's more BMX than you can handle with 10-Time World Champion Dave Mirra.
Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX is the only BMX game to feature Dave Mirra, 10-time World Champion and 11-time X Games medallist. Aspiring pros can play as Dave himself or 9 other superstar riders including: Ryan Nyquist, Kenan Harkin, Chad Kagy, Leigh Ramsdell, Troy McMurray, Mike Laird, Joey Garcia, Shaun Butler and Tim Mirra. Maximum Remix also includes two new special characters giving you a total of four wild characters to choose from.

game.name: David Beckham Soccer
game.desc:
Endorsed by the then England and Manchester United captain and international superstar, David Beckham Soccer is the last of Rage long tradition in developing soccer games. It includes both national and club teams (from England, France, Germany, Italy and Spain), plus the ability to create custom teams, with details ranging from the usual name, strips and colours to the stadium. Other than Beckham himself, no player is licensed (likeness is preserved, but names are replaced with phonetic equivalents, such as “Owin” or “Zanetee”), but the editor also allows the player to customize each player and team. Game modes include friendly, club season, several international cups (including the defunct Home Championship), Classic Matches (some featuring the highlights of Beckham's career, others just classic matches), Beat Brazil, where the player starts with France, and tries to beat Brazil with a progressively weaker team, Survival, where the player face top international teams, with goals against carrying over, until the player loses a match, and Train With Beckham, a series of drill minigames destined to teach the basics of the game and unlock “secrets”.
Gameplay is similar to previous titles developed by the company (most notably Microsoft Football 2000 and UEFA Striker), and not unlike Beckham, has its strong point during dead ball situations, where the player can choose either to use a set play to get the defense offguard, or take a direct shot or swerving pass using the traditional arrow indicator. In terms of options, the game doesn’t offer much to tweak, only bookings, offsides, injuries, match length and the decider (simple or golden goal overtime and penalty shootout)

game.name: David Beckham Soccer
game.desc:
Endorsed by the then England and Manchester United captain and international superstar, David Beckham Soccer is the last of Rage long tradition in developing soccer games. It includes both national and club teams (from England, France, Germany, Italy and Spain), plus the ability to create custom teams, with details ranging from the usual name, strips and colours to the stadium. Other than Beckham himself, no player is licensed (likeness is preserved, but names are replaced with phonetic equivalents, such as “Owin” or “Zanetee”), but the editor also allows the player to customize each player and team. Game modes include friendly, club season, several international cups (including the defunct Home Championship), Classic Matches (some featuring the highlights of Beckham's career, others just classic matches), Beat Brazil, where the player starts with France, and tries to beat Brazil with a progressively weaker team, Survival, where the player face top international teams, with goals against carrying over, until the player loses a match, and Train With Beckham, a series of drill minigames destined to teach the basics of the game and unlock “secrets”.
Gameplay is similar to previous titles developed by the company (most notably Microsoft Football 2000 and UEFA Striker), and not unlike Beckham, has its strong point during dead ball situations, where the player can choose either to use a set play to get the defense offguard, or take a direct shot or swerving pass using the traditional arrow indicator. In terms of options, the game doesn’t offer much to tweak, only bookings, offsides, injuries, match length and the decider (simple or golden goal overtime and penalty shootout)

game.name: Davis Cup Complete Tennis
game.desc: The Davis Cup is the premier international team event in men's tennis. The largest annual international team competition in sports[1], the Davis Cup is run by the International Tennis Federation (ITF) and is contested between teams of players from competing countries in a knock-out format. The competition began in 1900 as a challenge between the United States and Great Britain. In 2005, 134 nations entered teams into the competition. The most successful countries over the history of the tournament are the United States (winning 32 tournaments and finishing as runners-up 29 times) and Australia (winning 28 times and finishing second 19 times and also winning on four occasions with New Zealand under the name 'Australasia'). The women's equivalent of the Davis Cup is the Fed Cup. In this Playstation game the player can choose the player that he prefers from 40 different ones and then start competing in different tournaments and courts. The game features up to 4 players using the multi-tap function.

game.name: DBZ : Dead Ball Zone
game.desc:
This high speed futuristic sports game pits two teams of armed psychotics against each other in a brutal (and lethal) fight to launch a ball into the opponents net over, around, or through the opponent. Players are armed with a variety of weapons (chainsaws, grenades, machine guns, etc...) and a full range of unarmed combat moves (including the good old-fashioned crotch kick) all of which can be used to defend the goal but remember, the best defense is a good offense.
DBZ also has many of the features you would expect from a typical sports game including player development, league and season management, and stat tracking (scores, kills, etc...).

game.name: Dead Or Alive
game.desc: Durch umfangreiche Wahlmöglichkeiten der Kämpfer, tausende von Schlag- und Bewegungskombinationen und hohe Spielschnelligkeit, hat Dead or Alive eine hohe Langzeitmotivation. Ultra-hochauflösende Grafik, 9 Figuren (und zwei versteckte) 70 verschiedene Kämpferoutfits, 7 Spielvarianten und 7 zusätzliche Bonusvarianten, Herausforderung durch "Danger Zone" (Energieverlustzone bei Verlassen des Ringes) und fantastisch animierte Körperbewegungen.

game.name: Defcon 5
game.desc:
In Defcon 5, space aliens attack colony MRP-6F and turn a once peaceful evening of engineering into a battle for survival.
In the far future, conflict is at an all-time low and outdated defence bases are being vacated and replaced with automated software. You play as an cyberneer engineer sent to update one such base. Just after uploading the automating code, the base is suddenly invaded by unknown assailants from the air and ground. You must rely on your wits and the defence software to fend them off.
The main game takes place in a first-person view inside the complex. Trams connect the maze-like living areas to a handful of manned turrets outside. You must shuttle between shooting down waves of fighters in the turrets, and scouring the base levels for card keys during the down time.

game.name: Defcon 5
game.desc:
In Defcon 5, space aliens attack colony MRP-6F and turn a once peaceful evening of engineering into a battle for survival.
In the far future, conflict is at an all-time low and outdated defence bases are being vacated and replaced with automated software. You play as an cyberneer engineer sent to update one such base. Just after uploading the automating code, the base is suddenly invaded by unknown assailants from the air and ground. You must rely on your wits and the defence software to fend them off.
The main game takes place in a first-person view inside the complex. Trams connect the maze-like living areas to a handful of manned turrets outside. You must shuttle between shooting down waves of fighters in the turrets, and scouring the base levels for card keys during the down time.

game.name: Delta Force Urban Warfare
game.desc: In the US Army, Delta Force members are defined by their mental toughness, physical prowess and low-visibility ops. The US government has never officially acknowledged their existence. From EA comes a game for PS one that puts you in the uniform of Delta Force. Do you have what it takes? As a lone Delta Force operative, your job is to eliminate terrorists hidden behind every door to halt a global threat. An intriguing storyline, presented in cut-scenes and in-game radio messages, propels you through each mission. This is a completely new Delta Force experience, based on the 3-million selling franchise, developed exclusively for the PlayStation by Rebellion. Wild shoot-outs combined with stealth tactics, close quarters combat with strategic infiltration, time-sensitive ops, sniping and demolition all combine to deliver a thrilling action-packed adventure that will test your brain and your muscles. Engage and defeat enemies that react to gunfire, dive for cover, employ tactical maneuvers and pursue using a player's blood trail.

game.name: Delta Force Urban Warfare
game.desc: In the US Army, Delta Force members are defined by their mental toughness, physical prowess and low-visibility ops. The US government has never officially acknowledged their existence. From EA comes a game for PS one that puts you in the uniform of Delta Force. Do you have what it takes? As a lone Delta Force operative, your job is to eliminate terrorists hidden behind every door to halt a global threat. An intriguing storyline, presented in cut-scenes and in-game radio messages, propels you through each mission. This is a completely new Delta Force experience, based on the 3-million selling franchise, developed exclusively for the PlayStation by Rebellion. Wild shoot-outs combined with stealth tactics, close quarters combat with strategic infiltration, time-sensitive ops, sniping and demolition all combine to deliver a thrilling action-packed adventure that will test your brain and your muscles. Engage and defeat enemies that react to gunfire, dive for cover, employ tactical maneuvers and pursue using a player's blood trail.

game.name: Demolition Racer
game.desc: Jetzt können Sie es so richtig krachen lassen. 8 turbostarke amerikanische Racing Cars sind am Start und man hört das tiefe Blubbern der aufgebohrten 8 Zylinder Motoren. Die Flagge geht hoch und ein erbarmungsloses Rennen beginnt: Jeder gegen jeden, und alles ist erlaubt. Erleben Sie die dramatischen Überholmanöver und spektakuläre Crashs, die sichtbare Schäden an den Fahrzeugen hinterlassen! - Eindrucksvolle Hochgeschwindigkeits-Renn-Action mit grandiosen Crashs - In Echtzeit berechnete Fahzeugschäden und zahlreiche Effekte wie z.B. kaputte Reifen, herumfliegende Fahrzeugverdecke, Rauch und Feuer - 10 mörderisch harte Strecken - Irre! "Geisterfahrer"- und "Demolition Derby"-Modus - 8 verschiedene Rennboliden u.a. Kleinbusse und Leichenwagen - 16 Fahrzeuge pro Rennen - Barrikaden, Fässer und zahlreiche andere Hindernisse - 2 Spieler Split-Screen Rennen und Demolition Derby Wettkämpfe - Knallharter Original-Soundtrack von Fear Factory, Junkie XL, Empirion & Cirrus.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Disneys Der Koenig der Loewen - Simbas grosses Abenteuer (Germany).cue
game.name: Der König der Löwen: Simbas großes Abenteuer
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Disneys Der Koenig der Loewen - Simbas grosses Abenteuer (Germany).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Disneys Der Koenig der Loewen - Simbas grosses Abenteuer (Germany).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Disneys Der Koenig der Loewen - Simbas grosses Abenteuer (Germany).mp4
game.desc: Begleite den jungen Löwenprinz Simba auf seiner Entdeckungsreise und finde heraus, was es heißt, der wahre Herrscher dieses Landes zu sein. Vermeide Hindernisse im Dschungel und bekämpfe machthungrige Gegner, während du zu einem ausgewachsenen Löwen heranreifst und lernst, wie Simbas legendärer Vater Mufasa zu herrschen. Die hungrigen Hyänen, wild gewordenen Tierherden und gefährliche Löwen aus dem Schattenland werden dir schon Beine machen. Als König der Tiere wird dir eben nie langweilig. Erlebe das Leben von Simba in 3D: Wachse von einem jungen Löwen-Kätzchen heran zu einem mächtigen Löwen, indem du in der beeindruckenden neuen 3D-Umgebung die zahlreichen Level erfolgreich meisterst.

game.name: Descent
game.desc:
The Post-Terran Minerals Corporation (PTMC) digs up minerals on all nine planets of the solar system, employing humans and robots to do its job. Unfortunately, the mining robots are now being controlled by a hacker, and have taken the human workers hostage. The PTMC has tried to get the robots back under their control, but communication with the mining stations has been lost. In desperation, the PTMC modifies a Pyro-GX ship for combat and hires a mercenary, codenamed "Material Defender", to fly it. The mission is to destroy the infected mines and rescue human hostages, destroying any hostile robot that gets in the way.
Descent is a 3D first-person game that puts the player at the controls of the Pyro-GX spaceship. Descent is notable in that the player travels through various interior locations (mines) but can do so in 720 degrees of movement. The ship however only moves forward and backward in any of the directions it is facing. The ship is able to use a variety of weapons scattered as power-ups throughout each level. They include: standard lasers, the Vulcan Cannon (a chaingun-like weapon), the Spreadfire Cannon (a rapidly firing, shotgun-like energy weapon), the Plasma Cannon (a rapidly firing energy weapon more suited for medium-range combat), and the Fusion Cannon (fires a ball of energy that's more powerful the longer it is charged it up, but could destroy the ship). All of these weapons, except for the Vulcan Cannon, use the ship's energy supply. The Pyro-PX is also capable of firing regular concussion missiles, homing missiles, proximity bombs (sits in the sky, then explodes when something gets close to it), smart missiles (more powerful homing missiles that fire out homing energy balls upon impact with their target), and Mega Missiles (the ultimate weapons of mass destruction).
The goal of each level is to locate and destroy the mine's reactor. Once completed, there are only 45 seconds to find the escape hatch to get out of the mine before it explodes. As progress is made through the game, the AI will adapt to player's strategies and attempt to prevent the player from reaching the goals.

game.name: Descent II
game.desc: THIS IS YOUR LAST CHANCE... ...your last chance to experience the nauseating feeling of total rotation, speeding through the dark, twisting mines of Descent... your last chance to encounter the unique sensation on the system it was meant to be played on... your last chance to explore Descent worlds unavailable on any other system. It's time to get addicted to DESCENT MAXIMUM.

game.name: Destrega
game.desc: .... Over a 1000 years ago when the Strega suddenly appeared in Zamu'el, a small country located on the edge of the continent. These Strega possessed mysterious powers, and so they were revered and respected by the men and women of Zamu'el. Aside from their mysterious powers, the Strega also possessed knowledge far more advanced than that of Zamu'el, in such fields as metallurgy and agriculture. The Strega gladly passed this knowledge on to the inhabitants of Zamu'el, transforming the once poor country into a prosperous nation. Furthermore, the Strega, in their kindness, created objects that would allow normal humans to control powers similar to their own and bestowed them upon the people. Many of these objects, called Jeno at the time, were made and presented to the populace of Zamu'el. As the people learned to use the Jeno, they began to extend their borders into neighboring lands. With their new powers, they felt invincible, and failed to listen to the warning of the Strega whom they had once revered as gods. In just a short 10 years, Zamu'el had conquered the entire continent. However, even as they destroyed the last of their enemies, their mighty Empire began to crumble. Greedy, ambitious men rebelled throughout the land - each rebellion fought by Jeno bearers. The Jeno War, as it was eventually called, unleashed unimaginable destruction upon the land and its people. The very continent they had fought to win, was nothing more than a wasteland of disease and death by the time the fighting ended. In addition, the devastating power of the Jeno vanished, making the objects nothing more than fancy trinkets.

game.name: Destrega
game.desc: .... Over a 1000 years ago when the Strega suddenly appeared in Zamu'el, a small country located on the edge of the continent. These Strega possessed mysterious powers, and so they were revered and respected by the men and women of Zamu'el. Aside from their mysterious powers, the Strega also possessed knowledge far more advanced than that of Zamu'el, in such fields as metallurgy and agriculture. The Strega gladly passed this knowledge on to the inhabitants of Zamu'el, transforming the once poor country into a prosperous nation. Furthermore, the Strega, in their kindness, created objects that would allow normal humans to control powers similar to their own and bestowed them upon the people. Many of these objects, called Jeno at the time, were made and presented to the populace of Zamu'el. As the people learned to use the Jeno, they began to extend their borders into neighboring lands. With their new powers, they felt invincible, and failed to listen to the warning of the Strega whom they had once revered as gods. In just a short 10 years, Zamu'el had conquered the entire continent. However, even as they destroyed the last of their enemies, their mighty Empire began to crumble. Greedy, ambitious men rebelled throughout the land - each rebellion fought by Jeno bearers. The Jeno War, as it was eventually called, unleashed unimaginable destruction upon the land and its people. The very continent they had fought to win, was nothing more than a wasteland of disease and death by the time the fighting ended. In addition, the devastating power of the Jeno vanished, making the objects nothing more than fancy trinkets.

game.name: Destruction Derby
game.desc: In Destruction Derby 1 für PS1 hast Du nur eine Mission, die zählt: Zerstören! Stoße so lange mit den anderen zusammen und fahre sie über den Haufen, bis ihr Wagen den Geister aufgibt. Spiele gegen brutale Computergegner, oder gegen Deine Freunde und fahre in Destruction Derby 1 für PS1 alles über den Haufen, was Dir im Weg steht. Fahre auf verschiedenen Strecken und versuche in diesem actiongeladenen Rennen den ersten Platz zu machen! Lass Dich unterwegs nicht zerlegen und gehe als Sieger in Destruction Derby 1 für PS1 hervor!

game.name: Destruction Derby 2
game.desc: Setz dich ans Steuer deines frisierten Wagens und zeig es deinen Gegnern – entweder indem du sie überholst oder indem du ihre Fahrzeuge in Einzelteile zerlegst. Der berüchtigte Thrash-Metal-Soundtrack und der grenzenlose Spielspaß haben Destruction Derby 2 zum absoluten Klassiker gemacht.

game.name: Destruction Derby Raw
game.desc: Die zerschmetternde Fortsetzung für den König der Zerstörung! Progressive Fahrzeugschäden mit realistischer Physik. Bis zu 4 Spieler für maximale Zerstörung! Acht verschiedene Spielmodi. 24 Autos und 31 Gesamtstrecken mit Sprüngen, Tunneln und bösartigen Übergängen. Wolkenkratzer-Modus - kämpfen Sie auf Dächern! Fahrzeug-Upgrades zur Erhöhung der Kampfwürdigkeit.

game.name: Destructo 2
game.desc:
Destructo 2 is a simple color-matching puzzle game similar to Mr. Driller, originally released as part of a budget series in Japan. The main objective is to guide a cartoon character moving through an ascending pile of multicolored tiles, pushing the available blocks to create clusters of the same color. Groups of four or more tiles of matching colors can be removed by punching one of the connected blocks, with the vacant space being occupied by the falling stacks on top. The descending tiles that end up rearranged in new color clusters are automatically eliminated and give combo points.
As the tiles accumulate on the screen, the water level at the bottom starts to proportionally rise, receding when enough blocks are destroyed. The health meter for the main character is displayed below the gamefield, decreasing when suffering injuries from bomb explosions or drowning. The character also dies after being crushed against the top by the blocks. Power-ups and other items can be found inside containers that randomly appear on the pile, that have to be broke open with three punches to reveal their contents. The blue items give bonus points, eliminate all the tiles of a particular color, lower the water level and help in other ways, while the red items do the opposite and have to be avoided.

game.name: Detective Barbie : The Mystery Cruise
game.desc: Players have the chance to join "Team Barbie Detective" in Mattel Interactive's Detective Barbie: The Mystery Cruise. Like the earlier PC releases Detective Barbie and Detective Barbie 2, this game is a mystery adventure designed for girls (and mystery-loving sleuths of all ages). Unlike its predecessors, however, Detective Barbie: The Mystery Cruise was designed specifically for the PlayStation console. The game supports two players who are encouraged to explore a large cruise ship and three tropical ports-of-call in search of clues that will help solve the mystery of some valuable missing artwork. Luckily, players will find many vehicles and gadgets in Detective Barbie: The Mystery Cruise to help them along the way.

game.name: Detective Mouse
game.desc: Detective mouse is another of the numerous games developed by the Code Monkeys using the same structure since the game includes: - Cartoon film - Jigsaw puzzles - Colouring game This time the cartoon film is about a detective mouse called Chester that got to solve the case of the cheese store that had been robbed.

game.name: Devil Dice
game.desc:
Using Devils to wipe out rows of dice, play one-to-one challenges or take on four friends in a frenetic battle for survival in this devilishly fiendish multi-player puzzle game.
Choice of 4 different game modes: race against the clock, attempt increasingly challenging puzzles, team up with a friend or battle to be the sole survivor.

game.name: Devil's Deception
game.desc: Once upon a time, there was a prince who wanted nothing else out of life but marry his sweetheart Fiana and live happily ever after. But his fate took an unexpected turn when his malicious brother Yurias killed their father, the king, and framed the prince for murder in order to get Fiana for himself. Possessed by despair, the prince's soul could not rest in peace. The prince made a pact with Satan himself, and was given the Castle of the Damned, where he would set traps to capture souls, grow stronger, and eventually get his revenge...

game.name: Dexter's Laboratory : Mandark's Lab
game.desc:
Cartoon Network's boy genius Dexter is trying to save his laboratory from his archival Mandark in Dexter's Laboratory: Mandark's Lab? Mandark has infiltrated Dexter's lab and reprogrammed his computer, so players must help Dexter win it back by completing this adventure game covering four areas comprised of Dexter's house and his laboratory.
In each area there are two mini-games and four hidden blueprint pieces to one of Dexter's inventions that give him an advantage in each of the mini-games. Both Dee Dee's Dance Off, which has players pressing buttons in time to music, and Cootie Call where Dexter exterminates flying cootie bugs, take place in Dee Dee's bedroom. What's Buggin' Dexter, a foot race between Dexter and a bug that could potentially infect his computer, takes place in his computer's circuit board, and Dexter's Dodgeball takes place in the school yard with Dexter targeting school bullies with playground balls.

game.name: Dexter's Laboratory : Mandark's Lab
game.desc:
Cartoon Network's boy genius Dexter is trying to save his laboratory from his archival Mandark in Dexter's Laboratory: Mandark's Lab? Mandark has infiltrated Dexter's lab and reprogrammed his computer, so players must help Dexter win it back by completing this adventure game covering four areas comprised of Dexter's house and his laboratory.
In each area there are two mini-games and four hidden blueprint pieces to one of Dexter's inventions that give him an advantage in each of the mini-games. Both Dee Dee's Dance Off, which has players pressing buttons in time to music, and Cootie Call where Dexter exterminates flying cootie bugs, take place in Dee Dee's bedroom. What's Buggin' Dexter, a foot race between Dexter and a bug that could potentially infect his computer, takes place in his computer's circuit board, and Dexter's Dodgeball takes place in the school yard with Dexter targeting school bullies with playground balls.

game.name: Diablo
game.desc: Erleben Sie die Hölle auf Erden, wenn Sie versuchen Diablo, den Fürsten der Finsternis, und seine bösen Untergebenen zu besiegen. Kämpfen Sie als Krieger, Jägerin oder Zauberer, bahnen Sie sich mit Schwert und Zauberkraft Ihren Weg durch das Labyrinth, und sammeln Sie mit jeder Kreatur die Sie vernichten Erfahrung. Es kann keinen Frieden geben, solange Diablo noch herrscht. Drei verschiedene Charaktere mit individuellen Fähigkeiten, über 20 Zaubersprüche und 300 magische Arteffekte, über 100 Monster-Gegner und 15 zufällig generierte Labyrinthe.

game.name: Die Hard Trilogy
game.desc: Die Hard Trilogy teilt sich in drei Abschnitte, in denen Ihr die drei ersten "Stirb langsam"-Filme nachspielt. Durch die Stockwerke des Wolkenkratzers aus Teil 1 ballert Ihr Euch in Third-Person-Shooter-Manier. Den Flughafen aus "Stirb langsam 2" befreit Ihr in einem klassischen Railshooter per Lightgun von Terroristen. In der Umsetzung von "Stirb langsam 3: Jetzt erst recht" sitzt Ihr in einem Auto und fahrt unter Zeitdruck durch New York City, um Bomben aus dem Weg zu räumen. Kommen Euch dabei Fußgänger unter die Räder, klatscht ihr Blut auf die Frontscheibe und muss per Scheibenwischer weggewischt werden. Grafik und Gewaltgrad sorgten bei Fachpresse und Spielern für viel Aufsehen.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Die Hard Trilogy 2 - Viva Las Vegas (Germany).cue
game.name: Die Hard Trilogy 2 : Viva Las Vegas
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Die Hard Trilogy 2 - Viva Las Vegas (Germany).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Die Hard Trilogy 2 - Viva Las Vegas (Germany).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Die Hard Trilogy 2 - Viva Las Vegas (Germany).mp4
game.desc: John McClane ist zurück! Schon wieder ist er zur falschen Zeit am falschen Ort. Die Hard Trilogy 2 bietet 3 Spielmodis an Third-Person-Shooter, Lightgun Action und entzürne Chaos in dem du durch Las Vegas fährst. Im Movie Mode erhälst du die komplette Geschichte wie McClane in Las Vegas gelandet ist und es versucht auch diesmal den Terroristen in den Arsch zu treten. Schnall dich an, denn das wird eine Actionreiche Fahrt! VIVA LAS VEGAS!

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Die Hard Trilogy 2 - Viva Las Vegas (Europe).cue
game.name: Die Hard Trilogy 2 : Viva Las Vegas
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Die Hard Trilogy 2 - Viva Las Vegas (Europe).png

game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Die Hard Trilogy 2 - Viva Las Vegas (Europe).mp4
game.desc: John McClane ist zurück! Schon wieder ist er zur falschen Zeit am falschen Ort. Die Hard Trilogy 2 bietet 3 Spielmodis an Third-Person-Shooter, Lightgun Action und entzürne Chaos in dem du durch Las Vegas fährst. Im Movie Mode erhälst du die komplette Geschichte wie McClane in Las Vegas gelandet ist und es versucht auch diesmal den Terroristen in den Arsch zu treten. Schnall dich an, denn das wird eine Actionreiche Fahrt! VIVA LAS VEGAS!

game.name: Digimon Digital Card Battle
game.desc: Digimon Digital Card Battles are three round strategy match ups using 30-card decks based on creatures with unique attack powers, special effects, counterattacks, armor, and the ability to increase to stronger levels through "digivolution" using special option cards or creature fusion. Three Digimon card levels, rookie (R), champion (C) and ultimate (U) (mega Digimon), can be "digivolved" to create more powerful creatures. Partner Cards, selected at the beginning of each game, can get armor, gain experience points, and power up with the use of Digi-Parts as you advance through battles.

game.name: Digimon Rumble Arena
game.desc: Deine Lieblings-Digimons sind zurück und bereit für den Kampf. Stundenlanger Spaß für die ganze Familie. Digimon Rumble Arena bietet klassische Kampf-Action für 1 oder 2 Spieler. Nimm als eine deiner Lieblings-Digimon-Figuren an diesem aufregenden, fantastischen DIGITATIONS-TURNIER teil!

game.name: Digimon World
game.desc: Gestrandet in einer digitalen Welt hast Du nur ein Ziel vor Augen: wieder heil nach Hause zu gelangen! Dabei bist du auf die Hilfe der Digimon, kleiner digitaler Monster, angewiesen. Über 150 von ihnen tummeln sich auf der mysteriösen Insel, auf die es Dich verschlagen hat und jedes der seltenen Digimon ist absolut einzigartig. Schnappe Dir soviele Digimon wie möglich. Trainiere, füttere und pflege jedes einzelne und tausche gefangene Exemplare mit Deinen Freunden. Vielleicht schaffst Du es mit Hilfe Deiner Digimon, die Insel von dem bitterbösen Devimon zu befreien und der beste Digimon-Jäger aller Zeiten zu werden!

game.name: Digimon World
game.desc: Gestrandet in einer digitalen Welt hast Du nur ein Ziel vor Augen: wieder heil nach Hause zu gelangen! Dabei bist du auf die Hilfe der Digimon, kleiner digitaler Monster, angewiesen. Über 150 von ihnen tummeln sich auf der mysteriösen Insel, auf die es Dich verschlagen hat und jedes der seltenen Digimon ist absolut einzigartig. Schnappe Dir soviele Digimon wie möglich. Trainiere, füttere und pflege jedes einzelne und tausche gefangene Exemplare mit Deinen Freunden. Vielleicht schaffst Du es mit Hilfe Deiner Digimon, die Insel von dem bitterbösen Devimon zu befreien und der beste Digimon-Jäger aller Zeiten zu werden!

game.name: Digimon World 2003
game.desc: Hacker sind in Digimon Online eingedrungen. Können sie als Spieler ihre Pläne durchkreuzen? Aufbauend auf dem mit mehreren Awards ausgezeichneten Digimon World bringt Digimon World 2003 mehr als 20 noch nie vorher gezeigte Charaktere, die durch Code Digivolving verbessert und wie in der TV-Serie zum Supercharakter ausgebaut werden können. Sie haben die Technologie, sie haben die Kraft, und sie haben die Digimons...können sie den Planeten retten? FEATURES: - Packende Story, die zwischen der realen und der digitalen Online-Welt wechselt - Mehr als 240 Digimon Charaktere, die schon in der TV Serie aufgetaucht sind - 20 komplett neue Charaktere, die es nur in Digimon World 2003 gibt - DNA Digivolve - so wie in der TV-Serie geliebt und gesehen - Integriertes Blast Digivolve und Card Battle.

game.name: Dino Crisis
game.desc: Du schlüpfst in die Rolle von Regina, einem Mitglied einer Spezialeinheit, des Militärs, die auf einer kleinen Insel nach einem verschollenen Wissenschaftlerteam suchen soll. Bald nach ihrer Ankunft treffen sie auf die ersten Spuren einer längst aufsgestorbenen Spezies von Echsen. Also besorge Dir Waffen und sieh zu das Du den Echsen aus dem Weg gehst, denn sie warten nur darauf Dich in Stücke zu reißen.

game.name: Dino Crisis
game.desc: Du schlüpfst in die Rolle von Regina, einem Mitglied einer Spezialeinheit, des Militärs, die auf einer kleinen Insel nach einem verschollenen Wissenschaftlerteam suchen soll. Bald nach ihrer Ankunft treffen sie auf die ersten Spuren einer längst aufsgestorbenen Spezies von Echsen. Also besorge Dir Waffen und sieh zu das Du den Echsen aus dem Weg gehst, denn sie warten nur darauf Dich in Stücke zu reißen.

game.name: Dino Crisis 2
game.desc: Ein Jahr ist seit Reginas erstem Kampf auf Leben und Tod gegen die prähistorischen Dinosaurier und seit der Festnahme des verbrecherischen Dr. Kirk vergangen. Die Erforschung der 3. Energie wurde dennoch vehement fortgesetzt. Ein weiterer "Vorfall" zeichnet sich ab. Plötzlich verschwand Edward City von der Bildfläche - eine ganze Stadt, die sich der Forschung der 3. Energie gewidmet hatte. An ihrer Stelle wächst jetzt ein prähistorischer Dschungel. Schnell wird die Suchmission zur Rettung der Überlebenden und Sicherung der fehlenden Forschungsdaten ins Leben gerufen. Mit ihrem vielseitigen Waffenarsenal hat nur Regina eine Vorstellung von dem, was das Team erwartet... der reine Terror.

game.name: Dino Crisis 2
game.desc: Ein Jahr ist seit Reginas erstem Kampf auf Leben und Tod gegen die prähistorischen Dinosaurier und seit der Festnahme des verbrecherischen Dr. Kirk vergangen. Die Erforschung der 3. Energie wurde dennoch vehement fortgesetzt. Ein weiterer "Vorfall" zeichnet sich ab. Plötzlich verschwand Edward City von der Bildfläche - eine ganze Stadt, die sich der Forschung der 3. Energie gewidmet hatte. An ihrer Stelle wächst jetzt ein prähistorischer Dschungel. Schnell wird die Suchmission zur Rettung der Überlebenden und Sicherung der fehlenden Forschungsdaten ins Leben gerufen. Mit ihrem vielseitigen Waffenarsenal hat nur Regina eine Vorstellung von dem, was das Team erwartet... der reine Terror.

game.name: Dinomaster Party
game.desc: The era of dinosaurs is no longer what it used to be After a continuous period of meteorite showers and other natural catastrophes, the kings of the planet have given way to their offspring. These now find themselves left to their own devices, and set off on a search for a better life. It is time to build a new kingdom where their life will be peaceful.However, they have a long way to go. Quarrels between clans are raging, and our heroes are threatened by many dangers. However, this all remains at the level of our baby dinosaurs. They have transformed our little blue planet into a huge playground... In the end, only one will dominate. He will be the master, the chosen one who will have to establish a new equilibrium. Under the control of our cute baby dinosaurs, this world of jungles, volcanoes and mountains has given way to a world where fun and humor are omnipresent.

game.name: Dinosaurs
game.desc: Dinosaurs is another PSX game by The Code Monkeys that include: - Cartoon film - Jigsaw puzzles - Colouring game This time the story of the cartoon film is about a baby dinosaur that got lost when a volcano erupted and now he has to find his family again.

game.name: Discworld II : Missing Presumed...!
game.desc: Discworld II casts players again in the role of Rincewind, from the first game. Death, the grim reaper, who normally ushers the Discworld inhabitants into the afterlife, is on an extended vacation. This means that those whose "time is up" are faltering around in limbo. Now it's up to Rincewind to bring him back or suffer the fate of immortality. Gameplay is divided into 4 Acts. There are many locations to explore and a multitude of obstacles in Rincewind's path to overcome. Conversations with characters and interaction with inventory objects is necessary to move ahead. The game features unique humour similar to the previous game.

game.name: Discworld Noir
game.desc: In Discworld Noir, you assume the role of a wise cracking yet hopeless detective named Lewton. Because he's investigating the whereabouts of a certain lost lover, you'll walk around interacting with townsfolk and examining the scenery for clues. While it's based on Terry Pratchett's renowned fantasy world, the game sports a dark and dank look that differentiates itself from other releases in this acclaimed adventure series. You'll control the game with a standard PlayStation controller or the seldom used Mouse for unprecedented cursor movement. The latter provides the most accurate medium of control, but both operate in a similar fashion.

game.name: Discworld Noir
game.desc: In Discworld Noir, you assume the role of a wise cracking yet hopeless detective named Lewton. Because he's investigating the whereabouts of a certain lost lover, you'll walk around interacting with townsfolk and examining the scenery for clues. While it's based on Terry Pratchett's renowned fantasy world, the game sports a dark and dank look that differentiates itself from other releases in this acclaimed adventure series. You'll control the game with a standard PlayStation controller or the seldom used Mouse for unprecedented cursor movement. The latter provides the most accurate medium of control, but both operate in a similar fashion.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Disney-Pixar A Bug's Life - Disney's Activity Centre (Europe).cue
game.name: Disney / Pixar : A Bug's Life, Activity Center
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Disney-Pixar A Bug's Life - Disney's Activity Centre (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Disney-Pixar A Bug's Life - Disney's Activity Centre (Europe).png
game.desc: Disney's Pixar - A Bug's Life - Activity Center is one of the activity centers from Disney, in the game the kids have a great time exploring ant island and playing games with Flik, Dot and Francis. The kids can make their own puppet show by making puppets, scenes and choosing dialogue and take bug pictures to learn about different types of bugs. There is also a fun board game to play on the computer or print and play with friends away from the computer. This activity center is packed with fun and full of the zany bugs from the hit Disney movie, A Bug's Life.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Disney-Pixar A Bug's Life - Disneys Malen und Spielen (Germany).cue
game.name: Disney / Pixar : A Bug's Life, Malen Und Spielen
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Disney-Pixar A Bug's Life - Disneys Malen und Spielen (Germany).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Disney-Pixar A Bug's Life - Disneys Malen und Spielen (Germany).png
game.desc: Disney's Pixar - A Bug's Life - Activity Center is one of the activity centers from Disney, in the game the kids have a great time exploring ant island and playing games with Flik, Dot and Francis. The kids can make their own puppet show by making puppets, scenes and choosing dialogue and take bug pictures to learn about different types of bugs. There is also a fun board game to play on the computer or print and play with friends away from the computer. This activity center is packed with fun and full of the zany bugs from the hit Disney movie, A Bug's Life.

game.name: Disney Learning : Mickey
game.desc: Disney Learning Mickey introduces school-age players to the worlds of time, listening, and dancing. Players will have the company of Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck, and other Disney characters throughout the game. The "edutainment" includes matching exercises, identification games, and creativity art opportunities. The developers have targeted seven primary areas: cognitive, creative, emotional, moral, physical, social, and thinking skills are all given attention. Features: * Develops over 20 essential skills including early reading, sequencing and addition * Enhances memory, listening, creativity and critical thinking skills * Helps develop social skills and problem solving skills * Fun filled work sheets extend learning fun beyond the computer * Skill personalised to your individual child's needs, for endless hours of exploratory fun learning

game.name: Disney Learning : Winnie the Pooh
game.desc: It's time for Kindergarten with Pooh Christopher Robin has gone off to school and Pooh decides he should very much like to go to school, too! Join Pooh in this wonderful learning adventure as Tigger, Piglet, Eeyore and friends come together to hold school in the 100 Acre Wood. Experience the magic of learning as Pooh and his friends offer lessons on the alphabet, simple arithmetic, problem solving and much more! - Strengthens 25 age appropriate skills - Adjustable levels enhance individual skill levels - Progress report provides feedback on skill progression

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Disney's 102 Dalmatians - Puppies to the Rescue (Europe) (Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).cue
game.name: Disney's 102 Dalmatians : Puppies to the Rescue
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Disney's 102 Dalmatians - Puppies to the Rescue (Europe) (Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Disney's 102 Dalmatians - Puppies to the Rescue (Europe) (Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Disney's 102 Dalmatians - Puppies to the Rescue (Europe) (Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).mp4
game.desc: Follow a cuddly Dalmatian puppy and his wild-dog friends in the search for his missing sister. As well as a great half-hour cartoon video, Dalmatians features an easy-to-use virtual colouring book and a challenging puzzle game. Dalmatians is a story that all children will treasure.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Disney's 102 Dalmatians - Puppies to the Rescue (Europe).cue
game.name: Disney's 102 Dalmatians : Puppies to the Rescue
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Disney's 102 Dalmatians - Puppies to the Rescue (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Disney's 102 Dalmatians - Puppies to the Rescue (Europe).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Disney's 102 Dalmatians - Puppies to the Rescue (Europe).mp4
game.desc: Follow a cuddly Dalmatian puppy and his wild-dog friends in the search for his missing sister. As well as a great half-hour cartoon video, Dalmatians features an easy-to-use virtual colouring book and a challenging puzzle game. Dalmatians is a story that all children will treasure.

game.name: Disney's Action Game featuring Hercules
game.desc: Ein sagenumwobenes Abenteuer von Disney Interactive. Eine epische Reise durch 3 Welten und zehn riesige Level voller atemberaubender Action mit Liedern, Animationen und Ausschnitten aus dem Disney-Erfolgsfilm! hast du das Zeug zum wahren Helden?...

game.name: Disney's Aladdin in Nasira's Revenge
game.desc: Aladdin steht vor seinem bisher größten Abenteuer. Er muss über den Marktplatz von Agrabah sprinten, sich durch den Palast kämpfen, der Gefangennahme im Verlies entgehen, eine Oase durchqueren, die feurige Wunderhöhle überleben, Jasmin vor den Fallen in den Pyramiden bewahren, den Sultan in der Alten Stadt aus den Klauen des Bösen befreien und Nasira in ihrer verborgenen Höhle besiegen. Und Dschafar ist ihm dabei immer auf den Fersen... FEATURES: - Schlüpfe in die Rolle von Aladdin, Jasmin und dem Affen Abu. Jede Figur hat ihre eigenen Fähigkeiten und Talente. - Mit all deinen Lieblingsfiguren aus Disney "Aladdin", darunter Dschinni und der eigenwillige fliegende Teppich. - Kämpfe gegen Feuerschlucker, Messerwerfer und spuckende Kamele in einem rasanten Rennen durch die majestätische Stadt Agrabah.

game.name: Disney's Atlantis : The Lost Empire
game.desc: Das auf Disneys neuestem Zeichentrickfilm basierende Atlantis: The Lost Empire entführt einen in die Tiefen des Meeres, in riesige "unterseeische" Höhlen und in die Gesellschaft einer Reihe mythischer Ungeheuer. In alter Zeit, so berichtet Plato, versank die Stadt Atlantis im Meer und ist damit zu einem der größten Rätsel der Menschheitsgeschichte geworden. Fast zweitausend Jahre nach Platos Zeitalter bricht eine Gruppe von Forschern auf, um die verborgene Stadt zu finden, und man ist mit dabei. Aber Vorsicht bei den Entdeckungen - manche alten Geheimnisse sollten vielleicht lieber nicht aufgedeckt werden...

game.name: Disney's Dinosaur
game.desc: Disney's Dinosaur covers the exploits of a dinosaur that managed to fall off the beaten path. It seems that as an egg, Aladar was stolen and then accidentally dropped onto an island populated by lemurs. The colony took in the little dinosaur and raised him as their own. Players will get to take Aladar and his friends, Zini and Flia, on a journey across 12 different stages. Each of the friends possesses different abilities so players will have to exercise strategy and teamwork to navigate through each level. Want to smash a rock? You'll need Aladar's tail. If you need something airlifted, however, Flia is the only pteranodon in town. Players will have to avoid enemies and traps in this overhead 3D game while they gather items and accomplish level goals. Aladar wants to get back with his own species, but there are carnivores and other more pernicious things lying in wait.

game.name: Disney's Dinosaurier
game.desc: Disney's Dinosaur covers the exploits of a dinosaur that managed to fall off the beaten path. It seems that as an egg, Aladar was stolen and then accidentally dropped onto an island populated by lemurs. The colony took in the little dinosaur and raised him as their own. Players will get to take Aladar and his friends, Zini and Flia, on a journey across 12 different stages. Each of the friends possesses different abilities so players will have to exercise strategy and teamwork to navigate through each level. Want to smash a rock? You'll need Aladar's tail. If you need something airlifted, however, Flia is the only pteranodon in town. Players will have to avoid enemies and traps in this overhead 3D game while they gather items and accomplish level goals. Aladar wants to get back with his own species, but there are carnivores and other more pernicious things lying in wait.

game.name: Disney's Donald Duck : Quack Attack
game.desc: Donald Duck ist auf der Suche nach Daisy, um sie aus den Klauen des bösen Zauberers Merlock zu befreien. Aber die Zeit läuft, denn Gustav Gans hat sich auch auf den Weg gemacht sie zu retten. Meistere Donalds feuriges Temperament: von entschlossen über frustriert und ängstlich bis hin zur totalen Erschöpfung. FEATURES: - Meistere Donalds feuriges Temperament - Vier aufregende Welten: Entenberg, Entenhausen, Grundel Gaukeleys Reich und Merlocks Tempel - 24 Level in 3D - 4 Bonus-Level voll spannender Verfolgungsjagden plus Bonus-Level für Donalds neues Kostüm - 4 Endgegner inklusive dem Vogel Bernadette - Playstation 2 Special Edition: 14 Special Moves für Donald!

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Disneys Ein Koenigreich fuer ein Lama (Germany).cue
game.name: Disney's Ein Königreich für ein Lama
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Disneys Ein Koenigreich fuer ein Lama (Germany).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Disneys Ein Koenigreich fuer ein Lama (Germany).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Disneys Ein Koenigreich fuer ein Lama (Germany).mp4
game.desc: König Kusco hat's wirklich schwer. Eben war er noch wie gewohnt am Regieren, und plötzlich hat er ausgerechnet die Gestalt eines Lamas angenommen. Einen schönen Tages findet sich Kusco durch den Einfluss eines mysteriösen Zaubertranks bepelzt, vierbeinig und aus seinem eigenen Königreich verbannt wieder. Führe Kusco in einem Irrsinnig packenden Action-Game Spiel durch acht faszinierende Welten voller trickreicher Aufgaben und 3D-Plattform-Abenteuer. Mit Liedern und Videoclips aus dem Disney-Kassenschlager "Ein Königreich für ein Lama". Fahre auf wilden Flüssen und einer abgefahrenen Achterbahn. Meistere zahlreiche Spezialtechniken, während Kusco in die verrücktesten Geschöpfe verwandelt wird.

game.name: Disney's Goofy's Fun House
game.desc: Goofy must explore each a part of his home which consists of 15 distinct rooms. Each room includes elements such as a blender in the kitchen or table saw in the garage that the player can interact with. The main focus of play centers around collecting the 50 film canisters and certain objects Goofy has misplaced throughout his home. In addition to this, there are several mini-games that may be accessed via the paintings in the rec room of Goofy's house if the player finds all the objects that are needed. There's mini-games that range from golf and fishing to skiing and driving (based on How to play...) . After Goofy completes each mini-game and finds a few special items found somewhere in the house, a corresponding cartoon like: How to Play Golf will be unlocked. The game is considered "Completed" when the player completes all the mini-games, finds all of the cartoon-specific items, and collects at least 50 film canisters, unlocking the final cartoon.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Disney's Lilo & Stitch - Trouble in Paradise (Europe).cue
game.name: Disney's Lilo & Stitch : Trouble in Paradise
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Disney's Lilo & Stitch - Trouble in Paradise (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Disney's Lilo & Stitch - Trouble in Paradise (Europe).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Disney's Lilo & Stitch - Trouble in Paradise (Europe).mp4
game.desc: Lilo, ein junges hawaiianisches Mädchen, und Stitch, ein Alien mit vielen Gliedmaßen, sind die Stars des treffenden Titels Lilo & Stitch - eine Plattform, die auf dem gleichnamigen Disney-Film basiert. Das Spiel folgt weitgehend der Formel anderer 3D-Plattformer und führt die beiden unwahrscheinlichen Protagonisten durch eine Reihe von Levels auf und um die Insel Hawaii. Gemeinsam werden sie die wahre Bedeutung von "Ohana" (Hawaiianisch für Familie) entdecken. Das Gameplay orientiert sich eng am anderen Plattformstar des Systems, Crash Bandicoot, und ermöglicht es den Spielern, die Kontrolle über einen der beiden Charaktere zu übernehmen, während sie sowohl in 2D-Side-Scrolling-Ebenen als auch in linearen 3D-Teilen der Welt navigieren.

game.name: Disney's Party mit Winnie Puuh
game.desc: Geared toward young children, Disney's Pooh's Party Game: In Search of the Treasure is a board game adventure similar to Mario Party. As Pooh, Tigger, Rabbit, Piglet, Owl, or Roo, players must make their way around three increasingly difficult board games in an attempt to finish first. One to four players can participate in the adventure, or simply compete against each other in the mini-games. Adventure mode has players moving around the different squares of the board and challenging the other characters in one of five mini-games. The outcome of the mini-game determines the number of squares each player can move on the next turn. First place earns six squares, second place earns four squares, third place earns two, and last place earns one. Collectible honey pots along the way boost a character's moving potential, and there can be positive or negative effects when landing on a particular square. For instance, players may have to move back a certain number of spaces, lose honey pots, or receive an extra move. Players will also encounter Gopher, as well as bees, Heffalumps, and Woozles in their journey around the board. Five mini-games include Owl's Fruit 'n' Hoot, Pooh's Pinball Party, Tigger's Thunder & Frightening, Rabbit's Roller Races, and Piglet's Pumpkin Hunt. While only two mini-games are available for quick play in the beginning, the others become unlocked after playing the adventure mode. Difficulty levels for the mini-games can be adjusted to Easy, Normal, or Hard.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Disney's Peter Pan - Adventures in Never Land (Europe).cue
game.name: Disney's Peter Pan : Adventures in Never Land
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Disney's Peter Pan - Adventures in Never Land (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Disney's Peter Pan - Adventures in Never Land (Europe).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Disney's Peter Pan - Adventures in Never Land (Europe).mp4
game.desc: Alle Kinder werden einmal erwachsen - nur einer nicht. Begleitet Peter Pan bei seiner aufregenden Abenteuerreise durch Nimmerland. Du begegnest bezaubernden Feen, draufgängerischen Piraten, raffinierten Krokodilen und dem Furcht erregenden Käpt'n Hook in einem letzten Duell zwischen Gut und Böse. FEATURES: Erkunde über 20 riesege Level auf der Suche nach den Teilen einer mysteriösen Schatzkarte. Begegne all deinen Lieblingsfiguren wie Naseweis und Käpt'n Hook. Lege dich mit Käpt'n Hooks Piraten an und befreie die Verwunschenen Kinder aus den Klauen der Piraten.

game.name: Disney's Story Studio : Mulan
game.desc: You are invited to join the characters Mulan and Mushu on the journey of their lives. Videogame publisher NewKidCo and Disney Interactive extend the magic of Disney's hit animated film Mulan to the PlayStation game console in Disney's Story Studio: Mulan. This action-adventure game leads girls on a daring quest in search of the elusive magic scrolls containing the legend of Mulan. Based on the Chinese legend chronicling the adventures of a young woman determined to spare her father's life by taking his place in the Chinese Army, the game begins when Mushu is startled by Cri-Kee, and drops the scrolls containing the legend of Mulan, causing them to lose their magic. Players can either assume the role of Mulan on her quest to recover the missing scrolls, or simply play any one of five full games or mini-activities within the title. Discovering the magical scrolls will earn the player the title of Imperial Storymaker, but succeeding will require imagination and creativity.

game.name: Disney's Tarzan
game.desc: Tarzan erzählt die Geschichte eines Babys, dass im afrikanischen Dschungel von einer liebevollen Affenfamilie aufgezogen wird. Er wird jedoch durch die Ankunft einer Expedition jäh aus seiner friedlichen Welt gerissen, da er feststellt, dass er ein Mensch ist. Das Dilemma ist komplett als er sich plötzlich zu einer jungen, hübschen Dame namens Jane hingezogen fühlt. Begleiten Sie Tarzan durch viele Abenteuer und helfen Sie ihm Janes Herz zu erobern. Features: - Basierend auf der original Story von Edgar Rice Burrough - Original Videosequenzen und Animationen aus dem Film - 16 unterschiedliche Level spannender Dschungelaction - Massenhaft Endbosse und versteckte Bonuslevel - Schwimme, schwinge und fliege durch die aufregenden 3D-Level

game.name: Disney's The Emperor's New Groove
game.desc: König Kusco hat's wirklich schwer. Eben war er noch wie gewohnt am Regieren, und plötzlich hat er ausgerechnet die Gestalt eines Lamas angenommen. Einen schönen Tages findet sich Kusco durch den Einfluss eines mysteriösen Zaubertranks bepelzt, vierbeinig und aus seinem eigenen Königreich verbannt wieder. Führe Kusco in einem Irrsinnig packenden Action-Game Spiel durch acht faszinierende Welten voller trickreicher Aufgaben und 3D-Plattform-Abenteuer. Mit Liedern und Videoclips aus dem Disney-Kassenschlager "Ein Königreich für ein Lama". Fahre auf wilden Flüssen und einer abgefahrenen Achterbahn. Meistere zahlreiche Spezialtechniken, während Kusco in die verrücktesten Geschöpfe verwandelt wird.

game.name: Disney's The Little Mermaid II
game.desc: Arielle, die Meerjungfrau, und ihre Tochter Melody erkunden Meere und Küsten in diesem neuen Abenteuerspiel, das auf den beiden Disney-Klassikern mit der Meerjungfrau Arielle basiert. Lerne die Krabbe Sebastian, König Triton, die bösen Seehexen-Schwestern Ursula und Morgana und viele andere Figuren kennen. FEATURES: - Mit all deinen Lieblingsfiguren aus Disneys "Arielle - Die Meerjungfrau" und dem Video-Nachfolger Arielle 2 - Mit der wundervollen Musik und den Liedern aus den Filmen - Intuitives, benutzerfreundliches Spielvergnügen, ideal für Neueinsteiger und jüngere Spieler - Untertitel im gesamten Spiel regen zum Lesen und gemeinsamen Spielen zwischen Eltern und Kindern an

game.name: Disney's Tigger's Honey Hunt
game.desc: There's simply not enough honey for Pooh to have a proper party, and Tigger's the only animal in the 100 Acre Wood who can help! Control Tigger as he bounces from place to place, collecting as much honey as he can get his paws on. Of course, it's not all as easy as it sounds; slippery ice, dangerous bees, scary bats, and other environmental concerns will follow Tigger throughout his adventure, and there also dark caves and falling boulders to contend with! Intended for children ages four and up, Tigger's Honey Hunt has nine action-packed levels to master, and each features bold, colorful graphics that will have little ones giddy with excitement. Three mini-games allow players to earn the Accordion Leap and Tigger-tastic Bounce two maneuvers that will help procure Pooh's "most-favorite" snack. Packed with beloved characters from A.A. Milne's classic tales, this is one game that anyone can enjoy.

game.name: Disney's Treasure Planet
game.desc:
Folge Jim Hawkins bei seiner abenteuerlichen Suche nach der Beute aus den Tausend Welten. Das wird nicht einfach, doch wenn Jim die Signalkapseln finden und John Silver aus dem Weg gehen kann, wird er mit Abenteuern und Schätzen jenseits seiner kühnsten Träume belohnt.
Features: * Hebe ab und liefere atemberaubende Skate- und Surf-Manöver auf Jims Solarsurfer * Erledige den Meuterer John Silver und seine üble Piratenbande von der RLS Legacy * Erforsche aufregende und einzigartige Schauplätze auf der Suche nach den rätselhaften Signalkapseln.

game.name: Disney-Pixar A Bug's Life
game.desc: Das Spiel ist ein Third Person-Actionspiel mit jeweils verschiedenen Zielen in den insgesamt 15 Leveln. Um diese Level zu bestehen, agiert der Spieler zum Teil mit der Fauna. So springt man beispielsweise mithilfe von Fliegenpilzen über Schluchten. Dabei verbindet das Spiel immer wieder Jump 'n' Run-Elemente. Im Laufe des Spiels trifft man auf fünf Endgegner, die man besiegen muss, um weiterzukommen. Sammelt der Spieler in einem Level alle Bonusgegenstände, kann er einen neuen Videoclip, basierend auf der Filmvorlage, freischalten. Da das Spiel vor allem für jüngere Spieler konzipiert wurde, fliegen in jedem Level Teleskope, die dem Spieler bei der Lösung eines Problems helfen.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Disney-Pixar Buzz Lightyear of Star Command (Europe).cue
game.name: Disney-Pixar Buzz Lightyear of Star Command
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Disney-Pixar Buzz Lightyear of Star Command (Europe).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Disney-Pixar Buzz Lightyear of Star Command (Europe).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Disney-Pixar Buzz Lightyear of Star Command (Europe).mp4
game.desc: Er behauptete, er wäre der echte Buzz Lightyear...kein Spielzeug, sondern ein intergalaktischer Space Ranger! Nun, das Raumschiff unseres Weltraum-Helden, Buzz Lightyear, ist gerade gelandet, womit der Beweis geliefert sein sollte. Genau zur rechten Zeit, denn der böse Imperator Zurg ist gerade dabei, seinen finsteren Plan in die Tat umzusetzen, das gesamte Universum zu unterjochen. Und nur Buzz uns sein Space-Ranger-Eliteteam kann Zurg in seinem dunklen Streben nach der Herrschaft über das Universum stoppen. Buzz Lightyear eilt zur Hilfe! Volle Space-Ranger-Power: Als bester Space Ranger der Galaxie verfügen Sie über die neueste Space-Ranger-Ausrüstung, von Lasern über Strahlenpistolen bis hin zu Plasmastrahlen. Soll es einmal schneller vorwärts gehen, schwingen Sie sich auf Ihren Jetpack, Ihr Hoverboard oder Ihr Jetbike. Jagen Sie damit durch feindliche Welten und schlagen Sie sich mit Schildern, Sprüngen und natürlich all Ihren Space-Ranger-Fähigkeiten durch feindliche Planeten. Futuristische Science-Fiction-Welten: Erforschen Sie sieben unterschiedliche Welten in 14 aufregenden Leveln, wobei jeder seine eigene Landschaft und Herausforderungen bietet, und interagiren Sie mit 3D-Charakteren in Echtzeit. Besuchen Sie Jo-Ad, Trade World Manager, Karn, Garganua, Canis Linus und natürlich den Planeten Z, um Zurg herauszufordern. Komplett in Deutsch.

game.name: Disney-Pixar Die Monster AG : Schreckens-Insel
game.desc: Die Schreihälse brauchen Dich! Werde Schreck-Meister an der Monster-Akademie. Nach Abschluss der Monster-Akademie überreicht dir Henry J. Waternoose, Präsident der Monster AG, dein Diplom. Mit Filmauschnitten und den Figuren aus "Die Monster AG", dem neuesten Disney Kinohit. Spiele als Mike oder Sulley: Jedes der beiden Monster hat spezielle Bewegungen. Zahlreiche Erschreckenstaktiken und mehr als 15 riesige Bereiche wollen entdeckt werden. Schreibe dich noch heute an der Monster-Akademie ein, hier lernst du was es heißt ein gutes Monster zu sein.

game.path: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/roms/psx/Disney-Pixar Toy Story 2 - Buzz Lightyear eilt zur Hilfe! (Germany).cue
game.name: Disney-Pixar Toy Story 2 : Buzz Lightyear eilt zur Hilfe!
game.image: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/screenshots/Disney-Pixar Toy Story 2 - Buzz Lightyear eilt zur Hilfe! (Germany).png
game.marquee: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/marquees/Disney-Pixar Toy Story 2 - Buzz Lightyear eilt zur Hilfe! (Germany).png
game.video: /run/media/schuette/ext roms/media/videos/Disney-Pixar Toy Story 2 - Buzz Lightyear eilt zur Hilfe! (Germany).mp4
game.desc: Als Spielzeugheld Buzz Lightyear haben Sie alle Hände voll zu tun. Ihr bester Freund Woody muß aus den Fängen eines übereifrigen Spielzeugsammlers gerettet werden - ein Wettlauf mit der Zeit beginnt. Schnallen Sie sich die Raketenstiefel an, legen Sie eine neue Batterie ein und machen Sie sich gemeinsam mit Specky, Slinky und Rex auf den Weg, um dem Woody beizustehen. Basierend auf dem Sequel zu Disney/Pixars Trickfilm, der neue Maßstäbe in der Geschichte der Animationsfilme gesetzt hat, verspricht Disney/Pixars Toy Story 2 das Videospielereignis der Saison zu werden und liefert eine actiongeladene Gameplay-Mischung für Menschen aller Altersgruppen.

Basierend auf dem Sequel zu Disney/Pixars Trickfilm, der neue Maßstäbe in der Geschichte der Animationsfilme gesetzt hat, verspricht Disney/Pixars Toy Story 2 das Videospielereignis der Saison zu werden und liefert eine actiongeladene Gameplay-Mischung für Menschen aller Altersgruppen.

game.name: Disney-Pixar Toy Story Racer
game.desc: Disney/Pixars Toy Story Racer ist ein verrücktes Rennspiel, das dich zusammen mit der gesamten Toy Story-Bande in ein rasantes Wettrennen versetzt. Das Spiel wartet mit zehn der beliebtesten Charaktere aus Disneys Toy Story auf, darunter Woody, Buzz Lightyear und viele andere, die mit einem Affenzahn durch mehr als 30 Rennumgebungen voller überraschender Pick-Ups schlittern. FEATURES: - Pures Adrenalin mit Disneys Toy Story: Dreh auf als einer von zehn Charakteren aus Disneys Toy Story, Darunter Buzz Lightyear, Woody und Specki - jeder mit unverwechselbarem Fahrstil und eigenem Fahrzeug - Ultraschnelle Renn-Action: 19 an die Schauplätze aus den Originalfilmen angelehnte Rennstrecken, Mehrspieler Optionen, Bonus Moves und Spezialwettbewerbe - KI-geregelter Schwierigkeitsgrad: Disney/Pixars Toy Story Racer ist für Spieler aller Erfahrungsstufen geeignet. Die intuitive Kl "lernt" von den Reaktionen des Spielers und passt sich dessen Fähigkeiten an - Einzigartige charakterbezogenen Aufgaben: Schließ dich den quicklebendigen Spielzeugen an und mach dich an die Erfüllung ihrer individuellen Aufgaben. Besondere Herausforderungen schalten zusätzliche Charaktere und Aufgaben frei und vertiefen den Spielspaß. Im Spiel gilt es mehr als 150 Aufgaben zu erfüllen, darunter Wettrennen, Verfolgungsjagden, Stuntfahren, Gegenstände sammeln, Wettbewerbe und mehr!
